Chapter Programming Fundamentals
ChapterI. Programming Basics
1.1 Introduction
GSK988TA lathe CNC system new CNC product developed for inclined
bed CNC lathes and turning centers. This series CNC systems can control feed
axes (including axis), spindles, and are connected the servo drive and I/O
unit through the GSK-Link bus. The matching servo motor uses high-resolution
absolute encoder achieve position accuracy which can meet the
requirements high-precision turning and milling combined machining.
GSK988TA lathe CNC system has network interface, supporting remote
monitoring and file transmission. can meet the requirements networked
teaching and workshop management, and the best choice for numerical control 三
inclined bed CNC lathes and turning centers.

Product Technical Features
feed axes (including axis), any 3-axis linkage, spindles, supporting
turning-milling compound machining.
The 4-axis expansion axis the machine tool used for additional axis control,
which can used for loading and unloading mechanism, tool changing
mechanism, etc.

1.2. Numerical control system and CNC machine tool
The CNC machine tool mechatronic product composed subsystems (components)
such CNC system (Numerical Control System), machinery, electrical control, hydraulic
pressure, pneumatics, lubrication, cooling, etc. The Numerical Control System the control
core the CNC machine tool. The Numerical Control System composed control device
(Computer Numerical Controller, referred CNC), servo (or stepping) motor drive unit,
and servo (or stepping) motor.
Working principle CNC machine tools: According the requirements the machining
technology, write the machining program (hereinafter referred the program) and input
into the CNC. The transmission mechanism completes the feed movement the machine tool;
the logic control commands such spindle start and stop, tool selection, cooling and
lubrication the program are transmitted the machine tool electrical control system the
CNC, and the machine tool electrical control system completes control input and output
devices such buttons, switches, indicator lights, relays, contractors, etc. present, the
electrical control machine tools usually uses programmable logic controller (PLC for
short), which has the advantages small size, convenient application, and high reliability.
can seen that motion control and logic control are the main control tasks CNC machine
tools.

--- Page 30 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual CNC has both motion control and logic control functions, well built-in PLC The software that realizes the CNC control function divided into two modules: system The CNC has been loaded with the standard PLC program when leaves the factory. Instructions the machine tool manufacturer for the functions and operations controlled Programming the process compiling the machining program according the CNC
functions. According the input and output control requirements the machine tool, the PLC software (hereinafter referred NC) and PLC software (hereinafter referred PLC). When the functions and operation commands are described later, the description related the the PLC. special programming code for the information the part's external dimensions, machining
program (ladder diagram) written and downloaded the CNC, and the required electrical The module completes the control displaying, editing, decoding, interpolation, PLC control function will described accordance with the control logic the standard process, process parameters, tool parameters and on. Numerical control machining the
control requirements the machine tool can realized, which facilitates the electrical design acceleration and deceleration, and the PLC module completes the ladder diagram interpretation, PLC program, and the Manual will marked "standard PLC function". 1.3.2 Incremental system
The incremental system includes the minimum input increment (input) and the minimum
code increment (output). The minimum input increment the minimum unit the program
movement distance, and the minimum code increment the minimum unit the tool
movement the machine tool. The unit can expressed millimeters, inches degrees.

--- Page 33 ---
Chapter Programming Fundamentals
The incremental system divided into IS-B and IS-C. Use the first bit parameter 1004
select IS-B IS-C. The setting the first bit (ISC) parameter No. 1004 applicable
all axes.

1.3.4 Reference point
The reference point fixed point the machine tool. Through the reference point
return function, the tool can automatically move this position. Usually, the reference point
used change the tool set the coordinate system. The GSK988TA lathe CNC system can set
four reference points with parameters, shown Fig. 1-6.

--- Page 35 ---
Chapter Programming Fundamentals
XxX
一 人
Fig. 1-6 Reference Point
一
ges
1.3.5 Machine coordinate system
The machine coordinate system also called the mechanical coordinate system. the
reference coordinate system used CNC for coordinate calculation. the inherent
coordinate system the machine tool. The origin the machine coordinate system called
the mechanical reference point mechanical zero point. The machine coordinate system set
returning the reference point. Once the machine coordinate system set, will remain
unchanged until the power off.
Note: For machine tools equipped with incremental encoders, you must perform reference point return
operation set the machine coordinate system after each power-on power-off; for machine tools
equipped with multi-turn absolute encoders, not necessary perform the reference point
return operation after each power-on and power-off.
1.3.6 Workpiece coordinate system
The workpiece coordinate system rectangular coordinate system set the part
drawing for the convenience programming, and also called floating coordinate system.
The workpiece coordinate system preset the system, and the coordinate system can also
changed moving its coordinate origin. Once the workpiece coordinate system
established, will remain valid until replaced new workpiece coordinate system. This
system can pre-set workpiece coordinate systems (G54-G59).
1.3.7 Local coordinate system
For easy programming the workpiece coordinate system, its sub-coordinate system can

--- Page 36 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual Circular interpolation: Composite motion path and Yp, and Zp, and the Thread interpolation: The rotation angle the spindle determines the amount motion Note Xp, Yp, respectively refers X-axis its parallel axis, Y-axis its parallel axis, Z-axis its
人 circular are from the starting point the end point with the radius the X-axis Z-axis two axes, that the tool forms spiral cutting parallel axis, the same below.
set. The sub-coordinate system called the local coordinate system, shown Figure 1-7. specified the center specified path the surface the workpiece rotating with the spindle
Fig. 1-7 Local Coordinate System realize thread turning. the thread interpolation mode, the feed axis
follows the rotation the spindle, the long axis the thread cutting
1.3.8 Interpolation function when the spindle rotates once moves one pitch, the short axis and
the long axis perform linear interpolation.
Interpolation refers the simultaneous motion two more axes, and the combined
二 path the motion conforms certain mathematical relationship form two-dimensional
(planar) three-dimensional (Space) contour This type motion control method also
called contour control. The motion axis controlled during interpolation called the linkage
axis, and the motion amount, direction and speed the linkage axis are controlled the same
time during the entire motion process form the required composite motion path. Only
control the motion path point one axis multiple axes, but not the motion path the
motion process. This kind motion control method called positioning control.
The GSK988TA system has functions such linear, arc and thread interpolation.
Linear interpolation: Composite motion path Xp, and axes straight line from
the starting point the end point.

--- Page 37 ---
Chapter Programming Fundamentals
Note represents the combination X_Y axis, ete. (used programming).

1.4 Coordinate value and size
1.4.1 Absolute value programming and relative value programming
There are two ways instruct the movement the tool this system: absolute value
code and relative value code. the absolute value code, use the coordinate value the end
point program; the relative value program, use the moving distance programming.
There are two code systems the GSK988TA system, namely system and
code. system code, whether absolute programming relative programming used
depends the address word the code, shown the following table 1-5; system
code, absolute programming relative programming implemented through G90 and G91.

--- Page 38 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
G90 absolute command, and G91 incremental command.

absolute value code and the relative value code can used the same block, for example:
一 X100.0 W100.0; mixed programming

valid, but when the sixth bit (AD2) parameter No. 3403 set the system will alarm.

explained the description function codes.
1.4.2 Diameter Programming and Radius Programming
Because the cross-section the workpiece the CNC lathe control program usually
round, the X-axis size can coded two ways: diameter programming code and radius
programming code.
The user can choose use radius programming diameter programming during
programming, which set the third bit (DIAx) the status parameter (No. 1006).
Parameters related diameter/radius programming:
The third bit status parameter (DIAx):
一 Radius programming;

--- Page 39 ---
Chapter Programming Fundamentals
一 Diameter programming;
The first bit status parameter No.5004 (ORC):
一 The offset value expressed diameter;
一 The offset value expressed radius;

the following cases, the order Status program execution will change:
When the RESET key emergency stop key pressed while the program running,
terminated;
CNC alarm PLC alarm generated when the program running,
terminated;
When the program running, the operation mode switched the input and edit
operation mode, the program operation stopped single segment (after the
current block run, the program operation stops), switch the automatic operation
mode, and then press the cycle start key external cycle start signal when
switched on, start the operation the program from the block where the current
cursor located;
When the program running, the operation mode switched manual, MPG,
single step, program zero return, mechanical zero return operation mode, program
operation stops, switch automatic operation mode, and then press the cycle start 号
key when the external cycle start signal turned on, the program continues run
from the stopped position;
When the program running, the feed hold key pressed the external pause
signal disconnected, and the program paused. When the cycle start key
pressed again the external cycle start signal turned on, the program continues
run from the stopped position;
When the single-segment switch turned on, the program will stop after the end
each block. will continue run from the next block when the cycle start key
pressed again the external cycle start signal turned on;
The block selection jump switch turned on, and the block with before the block
skipped and not executed;
When the jump command executed, goes the jump target block run;
The program running sequence G70~73 compound cycle code special, please
refer "Chapter Code" this chapter for details;
When the M98 code executed, the corresponding subprogram macro program
called run; when the subprogram macro program finished, when the M99
code executed, returns the next block the calling block the main program
run (if the M99 code specifies the return the target block number, will turn the
target block run);

Chapter Code
Chapter II. Code
2.1 Overview
The code composed the code address and the following code values. used
specify the movement mode the tool relative the workpiece, and perform various
operations such coordinate setting. See Table 2-1! for details.
Goo
Code value
Code address
全 一
Note The leading zero the code value can omitted. Example: G02 and G2, GOl and are
equivalent.
Note The trailing zero the code value cannot omitted. Example: G20 and are different groups
codes; G12.1 legal code, but G12.10 illegal code.
Note The maximum input bits the code value eight bits. Example: G00000002 correct and valid
code, which equivalent G02.
Note Except for some codes such G12.1 and G13.1, decimals input not allowed, otherwise the
system will generate alarm. Example: G20.0, G00.0, G18. are all illegal codes.
2.1.1. Classification code
codes are divided into two categories: modal codes and non-modal codes.
After the code executed, the defined function the state remains valid until other
codes the same group are specified. This code called modal code. After the modal
code executed, before the defined function state changed, when the subsequent block
executes the code word, there need input the code again.
After the code executed, its defined function state valid for one time. Each time
the code executed, the code word must re-entered. This kind code called
non-modal code.
Example GO! and G00 are modal codes.
GOIX
valid this range

GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
can ramming
oo,
G00 valid this range
Z_;

G04 X4; (Delay 4s)
G04 X5; (Delay again for 5s, G04 non-modal code word
and must entered again)

(G01), the third (G91), the fourth (FPM) and the seventh (G23) bit parameter No.3402 set
the state power-on; group codes can set the second bit (INI) parameter
No.0000 set the state power-on; when the system powered on, the other groups modal
codes are the indicated state.
Note When the system reset, when the sixth bit (CLR) parameter No. 3402 set the modal
state the code remains unchanged; set the modal state the code will
converted when the system powered on. However, the G22 and G23 the group and the
G20 and G21 the group will not change the status.
Note The codes the group are all non-modal codes.
Note the codes group and group are specified the same block, the codes group
are valid, and the codes group only change the modal group codes.
Note The codes group 06, group 09, and group cannot appear the same program the codes
other groups. Group codes and G65 can only specified single block, otherwise
alarm will occur.
Note When the sixth bit (AD2) parameter No. 3403 set multiple codes the same group
can specified the same block, and the last specified code valid; set then
alarm will occur.

2.2 Command word change description
This system version has modified some system parameters and the command
words the code, mainly realizing the parameters and command words, and can directly
use the decimals for programming. For example, the command word the previous
version the G74 command, P3000 (ISB metric input) represents the X-axis movement
3mm. After the change, can directly written P3.0, which means that the X-axis
movement 3mm. The command words that are realized are:

2.3 Fast positioning G00
Code function: Under the absolute code, the tool quickly moved the position
specified the workpiece coordinate system; under the incremental
code, the tool quickly moved the position that only deviates from
the specified value the current position.
Code format: G00
Code description: IP: Absolute programming the coordinate value the end point
the tool movement; incremental programming the movement
amount the tool.

2.4 Linear interpolation G01
Code function: The tool can moved along straight line.
Code format: GO! F_;
Code description: IP_: For absolute codes, the coordinate value the end point
tool movement; for incremental codes, the amount tool
movement.

2.14 Chip breaking cutting G7.9
Code function: When the chip breaking function turned on, after certain distance
(chip breaking length) interpolation machining, the interpolation axis
will pause for period time (chip breaking pause time). Since the
spindle does not stop rotating this time, chip breaking can
performed.
Code format: G7.9 chip breaking function
G7.9; chip breaking function off
Code description:
和
When omitted K=0:
P_: Duration chip breaking pause (P>=0, unit: ms)
When K=1:
P_: Vibration frequency (when K=1, 0<P<5)
When omitted K=0:
Q_: chip breaking length (Q>0, unit: mm);
When K=1:
Q_: Vibration amplitude (when K=1, 0<Q<99.999 (ISB) 0<Q<9.9999
(SC))

2.17 Polar coordinate interpolation G12.1, G13.1
Code function: Convert the contour control from the programming code the Cartesian
coordinate system into linear axis movement (tool movement) and
rotating axis movement (workpiece rotation movement). This function
mainly used for end-face cutting. The Code format divided into
two ways: offset establishment and polar coordinate interpolation.

written G12.1;

2.18 Metric/Imperial conversion G20 and G21
Code function: Select metric input imperial input code.
Code format: G20; imperial input
G21; metric input
Code description: G20/G21 code must set the beginning the program, and must
specified separate block.
After the code for metric/Imperial conversion specified, the unit the input
data converted the smallest imperial metric input increment the incremental
system ISB ISC, and the angle unit remains unchanged.
The units the following values should changed after the conversion metric
and imperial systems: 三
——Feed rate code;
一 一 Location code;
一 一 Workpiece zero offset;
一 一 Tool compensation value;
一 一 The scale unit the hand pulse generator;
——Movement distance incremental feed;
Certain parameters.
Note G20/G21 are modal codes group 06, and the initial modal can set through the second bit
(INI) parameter No.0000.
Note During the conversion between metric and inch, the tool compensation value must reset
according the input increment unit. But when the zero position (OIM) parameter No. 5006
the tool compensation automatic conversion does not need reset.
Note When G20/G21 executed the code, the second bit (INI) parameter NO.0000 will
modified accordingly. Similarly, when the second bit (INI) parameter NO.0000 changed, the
modal displayed the system will also change accordingly.
Note The display bits and method absolute coordinates and relative coordinates are set according
the second bit (INI) parameter No.0000, while the display bits and method machine tool
coordinates are set the zero bit (INM) parameter No.1001 determined the zero
position (MCN) parameter No.3104.

2.20 Spindle fluctuation detection G25, G26
Code function: can detect whether the fluctuation range the spindle exceeds the set
range during the operation the spindle.
Code format: G26 P_Q_R_I_; spindle speed fluctuation detection
G25; The detection spindle speed fluctuation closed
Code description: 一
commana
The time from when the commanded speed changes the start spindle 三
nee
Value range: 0-~999999999 (ms)
The speed allowable rate the spindle reaching the commanded speed.
Q=(|(1-(actual spindle speed)/specified spindle speed)|* 100
the specified spindle speed falls within this range, judged that the
command should reached. After making determination, start
check the actual spindle speed. When calculating, please judge whether
the unit No.4912 parameter value 0.1% based
No.4900.0.
Judge the actual spindle speed as, when under overheating speed, the
spindle rate change
\(1-(Permissible speed not judged overheating/specified spindle
speed))|*100, when the variation rate the specified spindle speed and
the actual spindle speed exceeds the spindle variation rate
judged that the actual spindle speed the rate which causes
overheating. When calculating, please judge whether the unit No.4912
parameter value 0.1% based No.4900.0.
The actual spindle speed judged the fluctuation range the
spindle fluctuating speed the speed that causes overheating. When the
variation rate the specified spindle speed the actual spindle speed
exceeds the spindle variation range determined that the
actual spindle speed that causes overheating.

|Sc-Sa|

Description jump signal:
Skip signal (SKIP): X0.4
Type: Input signal
Function: X0.4 signal ends skip cutting. That is, block containing G31, when
the jump signal becomes "1", the absolute coordinate position stored
the system macro variable (#5061 ~#5065, the last bit corresponds the
number axes the system), and the same time End the movement
G31 block. The first bit (SKO) parameter No.6200 sets the valid

--- Page 115 ---
Chapter Code
input state the skip signal. When set the input signal "I"
valid.
Operation: When the skip signal becomes "I", the CNC machining follows:
When the block executing the skip code G31, the CNC stores the
current absolute coordinate position each axis. The CNC stops the
movement the G3! code and starts the execution the next block.
The jump signal detects not its rising edge, but its state. Therefore, the
skip signal "I", considered that its skip condition met
immediately.
Note When the jump signal input, order improve the positioning accuracy the tool, the feed
rate override, dry run, and automatic acceleration/deceleration are invalid during the movement
using the jump function. make these functions valid, set the seventh bit (SKF) parameter
No.6200
3.3
Note The skip signal valid, and the CNC stops the feed the axis immediately (no
acceleration/deceleration machining). Therefore, order ensure the accuracy the stop
position, the feed rate G31 should low possible.
2.22 Multi-level jump G31
Code function: When the jump signal turned on, the multi-level jump function valid
the specified block after G31, and the remaining movement
skipped. Generally used for plunge grinding, series operations from
semi-fine non-spark grinding can automatically completed
inputting jump signal each time roughing, semi-fine machining
non-spark grinding.

G01 code, and the usage similar.

order ensure the accuracy the stop position, the feed speed should not set too high.

command the block without updating the offset compensation value.

2.25 Polygon interpolation G51.2 号 全
Polygon machining refers the machining machining the shape the workpiece into 一
polygon rotating the workpiece and the tool certain ratio.
Fig. 2-33
changing the rotation ratio the workpiece and the tool and the number blades
the tool, the workpiece can processed into quadrilateral hexagonal shape. The polygon
machining this system adopts two methods. One that the spindle adopts speed control
mode, and the tool rotating axis completed CNC's control axis (servo feed axis); the other
that the spindle adopts position control mode, and the tool rotating axis completed
CNC's control axis (servo feed axis). The parameter No.7603.4 controls which control method
the CNC adopts.
Code format:
Cancel polygon machining (default state after
power-on)

--- Page 122 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
[one]
There are two control modes for the workpiece rotating axis set the system, one
speed control mode, the other position control mode. The parameter No.7603.4 controls
which control mode the CNC adopts, and the specified mode under different control modes
different, and the two programming methods are follows:
The speed mode controls the rotation the spindle
When parameter No.7603.4 set the programming method follows.

G50.2 polygon machining cancel

default the current spindle)

value parameter 7610)

omitted)

三 (3) Servo alarm;
三 一 (4) Reset Signal (including external reset Signal, reset rewind Signal and RESET

For the control the rotating axis, please pay attention the following aspects.
Note:
Before polygon machining, order determine the starting position the tool rotation, the reference
point return command the rotating axis must specified.
The direction rotation the rotating axis determined the sign the value.
JOG feed and MPG feed are invalid for the rotating axis polygon machining.
The valid signals for the rotating axis are mechanical lock and servo off.
The invalid signals for the rotating axis are feed hold, interlock, override and dry run.

2.26.1 Return reference point G28
Code function: From the starting point the current program, reach the intermediate
point position specified IP_ rapid traverse speed and then return
the reference point.
Code format: G28 IP__;
Code description: IP_, the code specifying the intermediate point (absolute
value/incremental value code). The code address each axis can
102

--- Page 125 ---
Chapter Code
omitted one all. Which axis omitted means that the axis does not
return the reference point, and the tool does not move all omitted.

Quickly locate from the current position the middle point the code axis
(point A—point B);
Quickly locate from the intermediate point the reference point (point B—point
R).
Fig. 2-34
Note Manual return the reference point has not been executed after power-on. When executing G28
code return the reference point, the system judges whether generate alarm the same
manual return the reference point according the third bit (AZR) parameter No. 1002, and
use the deceleration block proceed the reference point return. However, when the non-stop
reference point setting function used (the first bit (DLZ) parameter No. 1002 the first
bit (DLZx) parameter No. 1005 1), has nothing with the setting AZR. the G28
code executed before the reference point established, the system will generate alarm.
Note the process from the starting point the current program the intermediate point and the
intermediate point the reference point, each axis moves its own independent rapid traverse
speed;
Note Command G28 G30 the tool radius compensation mode automatically cancel the tool
radius compensation, and automatically restore the tool radius compensation mode during the next
movement code.
Note G28 cancels the tool compensation the second bit (CCN) parameter No. 5003 select
whether cancel the intermediate point return the reference point and then cancel.
Note Generally speaking, the G28 code should specified single block; the codes with the
same axis parameter address words such GOO GOI are specified block the same time,
IP_ will specified the parameters G28 code, and codes such GOO GOI only change
the modal value the corresponding code group, and not cause movement.

2.27.2 Workpiece coordinate system setting code G50
The coordinate system used for workpiece machining called the workpiece coordinate
system. The position the workpiece coordinate system can reset changing the original
position the workpiece coordinate system that has been set. system code, the
setting code the workpiece coordinate system G50, and system code, the setting
code the workpiece coordinate system G92. The following description uses system
code for explanation.
Code function: Set the absolute coordinates the current position, and establish the
workpiece coordinate system (also called floating coordinate system)
the system setting the absolute coordinates the current position.
After the workpiece coordinate system established, the absolute
coordinate programming will input the coordinate value according this
coordinate system until G50 executed again establish new
workpiece coordinate system.
Code format: G50
Code description: G50 non-modal code;
IP_: When using absolute code, specify the new absolute coordinate position
the current point the coordinate system; when using incremental
code, the absolute coordinate value the current point after G50
executed equal the sum the absolute coordinate value and the
coordinate increment value before the code executed.
Note After G50 changes the current workpiece coordinate system, other workpiece coordinate systems
will also perform the same offset.
Note the G50 code, one all the code addresses each axis can omitted. When the code
address the axis omitted, the original coordinate value that does not input coordinate axis
remains unchanged.
Note When G50 and group codes (G00, G01, ete.) are the same block, only the modal value

2.29 Accurate stop code G61/cutting mode G64
G61 command function: The programming axis the block must stop exactly the end
the block and then continue execute the next block.
G64 command function: When the programming axis each block after G64 just starts
decelerate (the programmed end point not reached), will
start execute the next block. The programmed contour
G64 mode different from the actual contour, and the degree
depends the value size and the angle between the two
paths, the greater the value, the greater DV.
115

--- Page 138 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
Command Format: G61; (accurate stop mode)
G64; (cutting method, default value)
Command Description:
block including G61 stops the end the program before continuing
execute the next block. This function used machine sharp edges and corners.
G61! modal command, valid before G64 commanded. The programmed
contour the same the actual contour.
G64 modal command, valid before G61 commanded. Its path different
from G61, shown Fig. 2-43.
G61 and G64 belong the 15" group codes. For the relationship with other
code groups, please refer the fifth group.
When the command executed, since non-cutting command, still
the exact stop machining the cutting mode.
When the G61/G64 command specified, will take effect the next command
号 block.
一
Specify the tool path exact stop
二
point

machining are performed.
2.31 Canned cycle code
一
order simplify programming, the system provides codes for single machining
cycle that uses only one block complete rapid traverse positioning, linear/thread cutting, and
finally rapid traverse return the starting point:
G90: axial cutting cycle; G92: thread cutting cycle; G94: radial cutting cycle
Note: G92: Thread cutting canned cycle code described section 2.33.5 this chapter.

G73 Code divided into three parts:
The block given tool retraction amount, the number cuts and the cutting
speed, the spindle speed and the tool function;
Given block interval that defines the path the fine turning, and the block
the fine turning margin;
When several continuous blocks that define the path the fine turning executes
G73, these blocks are only used calculate the path the rough turning and
are not actually executed.

2.32.4 Finishing cycle G70
Code function: The tool performs finishing machining along the workpiece finishing
track given the ns~nf block from the starting point. After rough
machining with G71, G72 G73, use G70 code finish turning, and
complete the cutting the finishing allowance single pass. When
the G70 cycle ends, the tool returns the starting point the cycle
rapid traverse and executes the next block after the G70 block.
Code format: G70 (ns) (nf);
Code description:
ns: the block number the first block the fine turning path. The Value range
1~99999;
nf: the block number the last block the fine turning path, and the Value
range 1~99999;
The path G70 code determined the programmed path the block between
ns~nf. The relative positional relationship and G70~G73 blocks follows:
G71/G72/G73 ......3
(ns)......5
block group finishing path
(nf) ......5
G70 P(ns) Q(nf);
148

--- Page 171 ---
Chapter2 GCode
G70 generally written after the ns~nf block;
When executing the G70 finishing cycle, the codes the ns~nf block are
valid;
G96, G97, G98, G99, G40, G41, G42 codes are valid when executing G70
finishing cycle;
During the execution the G70 code, you can stop the automatic operation and
move manually, but will execute the G70 cycle again, you must return the
position before the manual movement. you not return, continue execute,
and the following running track will misaligned;
Execute single block operation, and the program will stop after running the end
the current track the buffer segment;
The G70 code cannot executed the input mode, otherwise alarm will
generated.
Note: When the tool cuts the end position the finished tuming shape the fine cutting cycle, the
two axes will return the starting point the cycle rapid traverse the same time, care
should taken during programming prevent over-cutting.
2.32.5 Multiple cycles axial grooving G74
Code function: Radial (X-axis) feed cycle compound axial interrupted cutting cycle: feed,
retract, and re-feed from the starting point (Z-axis) until the cutting
reaches the same Z-axis coordinate the cutting end point position, then
radially retract, axially retract the same position the starting point
axis coordinate, complete axial cutting cycle; After re-feeding the
radial direction, the next axial cutting cycle carried out; after cutting
the cutting end point, return the starting point (the starting point and
end point G74 are the same), and the compound cycle axial
grooving completed. The radial and axial feed directions G74 are
determined the relative position the cutting end point (U), (W)
and the starting point. This code used machine annular grooves
central deep holes the end the workpiece, with axial intermittent
cutting, plays the role chip breaking and chip removal time.
Code format: G74 R(e);
G74 Z(W) Q(Ak) R(Ad)
Code description:
The cycle action carried out the G74 block containing (W) and (Ak).
the block does not contain (W), the G74 code will not executed. only the
"G74 R(e);" block executed, only the value parameter No. 5139 modified,

2.32.8 Precautions for multiple cycles
the blocks that command multiple cycles, the addresses and
should specified for each block correctly.
the block specified address for G71, G72 G73, GOO GO! should
commanded. there command, the system generates alarm.
MDI and DNC mode, G70, G71, G72 G73 cannot commanded, otherwise,
the system will generate alarm. But MDI and DNC mode, G74, G75 G76
can commanded.
The number blocks G70, G71, G72 G73 codes between the sequence
numbers specified and cannot exceed 100 blocks.
The G71, G72 G73 codes the block among the sequence numbers specified
and cannot specify the following codes:
Group non-modal codes except G04; 号
All group codes except G00, G01, G02 and G03;
G20 and G21;
M98, M99;
Avoid using the skip function the block between the sequence numbers specified
and the skip function used the block between the sequence numbers
specified and the signal for skipping machining the system reads the state
the block buffer.
The tool nose radius compensation G71~G76 invalid.
The second bit (FCK) parameter No.5104 used set whether the multiple cycle
code G71, G72 G73 inspected. When set inspection, alarm will
issued the positioning point within the cutting range.
The zero position (CTR) parameter No.5102 sets whether G71~G73 should
processed tool compensation first when roughing the target shape.
10) The first bit (MRC) parameter No.5102 sets whether the multi-cycle code G71,
the fine-cutting cycle G72 will alarm when not monotonous. When set
will alarm.
11) The seventh bit (ESC) parameter No.5105 used set the multiple cycle code
G71 type), whether use rapid tail-out during rough turning G72.
12) Parameter #5102.2 determines whether valid automatically recognize Type
and Type machining G71, G72, G73 cycles according the monotonicity the
program.
159

--- Page 182 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual 13) Parameter 5102.1 determines whether check monotonicity G71, G72, G73 cycles (valid when parameter 5102#2=1). 14) Note 10: Parameters #5105.1 and #5105.2 determine whether G71, G72 Type G71, and G72 Type perform rough and finishing cutting. GSK988TA lathe has variety thread cutting functions, which can process cutting code G76. The machine tool with thread cutting function must equipped with spindle encoder. 三 二 The number spindle encoder lines and the transmission ratio the spindle the encoder are set parameters. When cutting the thread, the system will move the X-axis Z-axis and GSK988TA has variety thread cutting functions that can used machine threads Under the condition that the thread pitch determined, the moving speed the X-axis Note When using the modal function the command code, you can execute M30 automatic mode (execute M30 modal MDI mode without canceling) execute GO] command code cancel the Note When the parameter TSP (No.1469) not the spindle speed fluctuation percentage the start thread cutting detected. When exceeds the set range, alarm will issued.
2.33 Thread cutting code imperial/metric single-head, multi-head, and variable-pitch threads. The thread retraction start the thread machining after receiving the one-turn signal the spindle encoder. Therefore, without undercuts. However, since the X-axis and Z-axis have acceleration and deceleration and Z-axis during thread cutting determined the spindle speed and has nothing with modal state resetting. 160
length and angle are variable. multi-cycle thread cutting can cut one side protect the tool long the spindle speed not changed, the same thread can processed rough turning processes the beginning and end thread cutting, the pitch error this time relatively the cutting feed rate override. Whether the spindle override control valid during thread
and improve the surface finish. Thread functions include: continuous thread cutting code G32, and fine turning multiple times. large, still necessary The actual thread start and end leave the distance between the cutting set the parameter. When the spindle speed changes, the pitch error will occur due
variable pitch thread cutting code G34, thread cycle cutting code G92, thread multiple cycle thread lead-in length and the retracted tool. the acceleration and deceleration the X-axis and Z-axis. Therefore, not adjust the
spindle speed during thread cutting, let alone stop the spindle, The spindle stop will cause
damage the tool and workpiece.

2.33.2 Rigid thread cutting code G32.1
Code format: G32.1 FOD
Code function: Traditional thread interpolation uses the number pulses fed back the
position encoder mounted the spindle calculate the current
movement the feed axis realize the thread interpolation method
where the feed axis follows the spindle. The disadvantage that The
thread lead error acceleration/deceleration relatively large. the
rigid thread interpolation mode, the spindle motor works the same the
servo motor. The thread interpolation performed the interpolation
between the feed axis and the spindle, obtain higher precision
thread.
Code description: G32.1: code for rigid thread interpolation.
The starting angle thread interpolation.
X\Z: End point coordinate thread interpolation.
F(D: the lead the thread, F(1)>0 right-hand thread, F(1)<0 left-hand
thread.

2.33.3. Arc thread G32.2, G32.3
Code function: When the conventional thread command G32 used process the
thread, the cutting path between the starting point and the end point
the thread straight line; while the cutting path between the starting
point and the end point the circular thread arc. The coordinate
axis with large displacement from the starting point the end point
called the long axis, and the other coordinate axis called the short axis.
During the movement, the long axis moves one lead for each
revolution the main shaft, and the short axis and the long axis are
interpolated arc., When the tool cuts the workpiece, spiral groove
with equal pitch formed the surface the workpiece realize the
machining equal pitch threads.

2.33.9 Enhanced multiple thread cutting cycle G78
Code function: Finish the thread machining the specified tooth height (total depth
cut) through multiple thread roughing and thread finishing. the defined
thread angle not 0°, the entry point the thread roughing will
gradually move from the thread crest the thread Bottom the tooth,
that the included angle between two adjacent threads the specified
thread angle. G78 has thread precession and retraction functions. 一
possible choose one-sided cutting edge thread cutting both sides 号
cutting edge cutting turn. The amount cutting tool gradually
reduced, which beneficial protect the tool and improve the thread
accuracy. The G78 code can process straight thread and taper thread, but
not the end thread.
Code format: G78 P(m)(r)(a) Q(Admin) R(d)
G78 X(U) Z(W) P(k) Q(Ad)
Code description:
Different value between the X-axis absolute coordinate the thread end point and the starting
point
Different value between the Z-axis absolute coordinate the thread end point and the starting
point
Thread finishing times 01~99 (unit: times), code value remains valid after execution, and the
value system data parameter No. 5142 modified When not entered, the value
system data parameter No. 5142 used the number fine turning times. During thread
finishing, cutting along the programmed path, the first finishing cutting amount and the
subsequent finishing cutting amount which used eliminate undercutting caused
mechanical stress during cutting and improve thread accuracy and surface quality
Cut-in Mode:

cutting edge cuts along the left side the thread profile;
The cutting edge cuts along the right side the thread teeth profile; 3:The
cutting edge cuts alternately along the thread teeth profile left and right;

2.34 Grinding canned cycle code
The grinding canned cycle command provided the system can use block containing
function command the repeated machining actions that are unique the grinding process
and require several block commands complete. Grinding canned cycle codes can
divided into the following situations.
Cutting Grinding

Pendulum grinding

2.35 Constant line speed control G96 and G97
G96 Code function: Constant speed control valid, cutting linear speed (m/min)
given, and the constant speed control canceled.
Code format: G96 Sxxxxx;
Code description: G96 modal code, currently G96 modal, you don’t need
input G96;
cutting line speed under constant line speed control.
G97 Code function: Cancel the constant line speed control, the constant speed control
valid, and the spindle speed (r/min) given.
Code format: G97 Sxxxxx;
Code description: G97 modal code, currently G97 modal, G97 may not
input;
Sxxxxx Spindle speed (r/min) under constant speed control.
Related Code: G50
Code function: Set the maximum spindle speed limit value (r/min) during constant
surface speed control.
Code format: G50 Sxxxxx;
Code description:
When the system powered on, the maximum spindle speed has not been
specified, the spindle speed not limited. The limitation the maximum spindle
speed only valid for the G96 state, and invalid for the G97 state.
The value set G50 modal value. The value always valid before
setting the new maximum speed;
Special attention should paid G50: G50 executed, the spindle speed
will limited rpm during constant surface speed control (the spindle will not
rotate).
When turning workpiece lathe, the workpiece usually rotates with the
spindle axis the centerline. The cutting point the tool cutting the workpiece
can seen circular motion around the spindle axis. The instantaneous rate
the circumferential tangent direction called the linear cutting speed (usually
referred linear speed). Workpieces different materials and tools different
materials require different linear speeds.
207

--- Page 230 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual constant speed control, the spindle speed changed only during the cutting constant linear velocity control, the coordinate axis the workpiece When the constant speed control valid, GSO Sxxxxx can limit the maximum speed and X-axis coordinate value higher than the setting value G50 Sxxxxx, System speed control function valid. During constant surface speed control, the spindle
feed (interpolation) process with the change the absolute value the absolute coordinate system must coincide with the spindle axis (workpiece rotating axis), spindle speed (r/min). When the spindle speed calculated according the linear the actual spindle speed the maximum spindle speed Limit value (that is, the speed changes with the absolute value the X-axis absolute coordinate value
coordinate value the programmed path X-axis. For GOO rapid traverse, since otherwise, the actual linear velocity will inconsistent with the given linear setting value G50 Sxxxxx). The maximum speed limit value defined G50 res [ov the programmed path (ignoring the tool length compensation). The absolute value
actual cutting performed, G00 the process execution, the spindle speed velocity. 三 二 Sxxxxx maintained before re-assignment. The maximum speed limit function When the spindle speed analog voltage control function valid, the constant line the X-axis absolute coordinate value increases, the spindle speed decreases, and
remains unchanged, and the spindle speed this time calculated according valid G96 state. G97 state, the maximum spindle speed set GSOxxxxx the X-axis The absolute value the absolute coordinate value decreases, and the
the linear speed the end the block. not limited, but the maximum spindle speed limit value still saved.. spindle speed increases, that the cutting linear speed remains the code value.
Address Incremental Metric Input (mm) Imperial Input (inch) Using the constant line speed control function cut the workpiece can make the
surface finish the workpiece with varying diameters consistent.
Linear speed spindle speed |X] +1000 (m/min)
Spindle speed: r/min

(diameter value)

Precautions: 一
Note G96 and G97 are modal code words the same group, and only one valid the same time.
G97 the initial state code word, G97 valid when the system powered on.
Note the G96 state, the commanded value saved even the G97 state. When returning the
G96 state, new value commanded, the value the previous G96 code will restored
the current valid linear velocity. there saved value, will output the lowest speed
under G96.
Note When changing from G96 state G97 state, there command code (r/min) the G97
block, then the final speed G96 state will used the code G97 state, that is, the spindle
speed will not change this time;
Note When the machine locked and axes not move when executing the and Z-axis
motion codes), the constant line speed contro] function still valid;
Note constant surface speed control, when the spindle speed calculated from the cutting linear
speed higher than the maximum speed the current spindle gear, the spindle speed this time
limited the highest speed the current spindle gear;
Note Although the constant line speed control function can also valid during thread cutting, order
ensure the accuracy thread machining, not use constant line speed control during thread
cutting. Thread cutting should performed the G97 state;
Note The number bits allowed the code set the parameter No. 3031.
Note When X=0, the theoretical speed infinite, but because the maximum analog voltage sent 10V,
the actual speed the speed value corresponding the 10V voltage.
Programming example:

Chapter Code
the actual cutting feed rate. When the spindle speed changes, the
actual cutting feed rate changes accordingly. Using G99 Fxxxx
specify the cutting feed per revolution the spindle can form
uniform cutting pattern the surface the workpiece. For
machining G99 mode, the machine tool must equipped with
spindle encoder.
The Value range G98 and G99 codes shown the table below.
Address Incremental Metric Input (mm) Imperial Input (inch)
System
ISB system 001~60000 (mm/min) 0.00001~2400 (inch/min)

Conversion Formula Feed/ Revolution and Feed/Minute:
FrxS
Among them: Fm: feed amount/minute;
Fr: Feed amount/revolution;
Spindle speed.
After the system executes the code, the value remains unchanged.
Note G98 and G99 are modal codes the same group, and only one can valid the same time.
The default mode when the system powered can set the fourth bit (FPM) parameter
No.3402.
Note G99 mode, when the spindle speed lower than Ir/min, the cutting feed rate will appear
uneven; when the spindle speed fluctuates, the actual cutting feed rate will have following error.
order ensure the machining quality, recommended that the spindle speed selected during
machining should not lower than the minimum speed the spindle servo inverter output
valid torque;
Note Parameter No.1422 can set the upper limit the cutting feed rate. the actual cutting feed rate
(value after multiplying the override) exceeds the specified upper limit, will clamped the
upper limit speed.
Note When G99 commanded G98 modal but command commanded, the value the
modal value the last G99 executed. the same way, when G98 commanded G99 modal
but command commanded, the value the modal value the last G98 executed.
Note The initial state G98/G99. When G99/G98 executed separately after power-on, the system
will execute according the speed value set parameter #1411.

2.37 Gear hobbing function G51.3
When machining (grinding/cutting) gears with this function, the rotation the workpiece
axis can synchronized with the rotation the tool axis (grinding wheel/hob). The
synchronization ratio can specified the program.
Code format: G51.3T
Code description:
Description
Main control axis (number teeth workpiece)
Slave control axis (number tool hobbing bars)
The signs can specify the direction rotation the workpiece
吧 axis relative the tool axis
有 When positive, the rotation direction the workpiece axis
and the tool axis are the same
二 When negative, the rotation direction the workpiece axis
and the tool axis are opposite
Gear helix angle
Gear module diametral pitch
Spindle speed (with direction)

High-speed deep hole drilling cycle (Specify Value (not zero) and parameter
RTR (NO.5101#2) "0")
This cycle performs high-speed deep hole cutting operations. Before entering the
bottom the hole, the cutting feed performed intermittently and the tool retracted
and chipped with the specified retraction amount. The cycle reciprocates until the tool
fed the bottom the hole, and then the tool retracted end machining. When the
command not specified, the high-speed deep hole turning cycle takes the value set
parameter 5114 the tool retraction amount.
Code format: G83 X(U)_ C(H)_ Z(W)_
G87 Z(W)_ C(H)_ X(U)_

Chapter2 GCode
2.39 Tapping cycle code
The GSK988TA lathe system uses the end tapping cycle (G84) and the side tapping cycle
(G88) realize the tapping function. Tapping divided into two methods: ordinary tapping
(flexible) and rigid tapping. the ordinary tapping mode, the spindle rotation and the feed
the tapping axis are controlled separately, and the synchronization relationship between the two
cannot well satisfied. the rigid tapping mode, the control mode the spindle motor the
same that the servo motor. One revolution the spindle corresponds certain amount
feed along the spindle axis. This relationship also maintained during spindle acceleration
and deceleration. Rigid tapping spindles not need floating chucks variable taps (required
for use ordinary tapping methods), but can perform faster and more precise tapping
operations.
When programming, M29 (other codes can set according parameter No.5210,
the rigid mode can specified directly codes without codes). specified use
ordinary tapping cycles and rigid tapping cycles.
use rigid tapping, the machine tool must have the corresponding conditions, that is, the
spindle uses position control and applied axis. Otherwise, the system will not support
it. This function applicable for higher configuration machine tools.
The end tapping cycle (G84) and the side tapping cycle (G88) and the drilling canned
cycle G83/G87 and boring cycle G85/G89 belong the 10" group codes. Use G80
code group cancel the tapping canned cycle. Perform normal operation after the
drilling canned cycle canceled. Clear point and hole bottom point) data, other
tapping data (P, are also cleared.
During tapping, the compensation vector tool compensation will temporarily
canceled. After executing this code, the compensation vector will automatically restored.
2.39.1 Determine tapping mode
The tapping cycle divided into two types: ordinary tapping and rigid tapping.
Specify M29 the previous section the G84 (G88) tapping block (parameter
Command M29 the same segment the G84 (G88) tapping block (parameter
Rigid tapping No.5200#0 needs set and the C-axis clamping code cannot
G84 (G88) directly used rigid tapping command (parameter No.5200#0
221

--- Page 244 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
Ordinary tapping method:
When parameter No.5200#0 set and M29 command not specified.
e.g.
X_Z_;
X_Z,;
G84X_C_Z R_P_F_K,;
Rigid tapping mode:
There are three ways specify rigid tapping.
Specify M29 the previous section the G84 (G88) tapping block
(parameter No.5200#0 needs set
e.g.
X_Z_;
M298
G84X_C_Z
Command M29 the same segment the G84 (G88) tapping block
(parameter No.5200#0 needs set and the C-axis clamping code
cannot specified the same segment)
e.g.

G84 X_C_Z_R_P_F_K_M29S
G84 (G88) directly used rigid tapping command (parameter
No.5200#0 needs set
e.g.
X_Z_;
Note Parameter 5210 can used specify the code for rigid tapping. When specified the
default M29.

Note Use the specified rigid tapping method temporarily designate specification axis
movement command between M29 and G84/G88 blocks generate alarm.
Note Repeatedly specify M29 alarm during the tapping cycle.
Note M29 S___ instructs the rigid tapping mode, PLC will switch accordingly after receiving M29, and
the spindle will stop rotating. The spindle output the M29 segment equivalent the output
SO.

use rigid tapping, the machine tool must have the corresponding conditions, that is, the
spindle uses position control and applied axis. Otherwise, the system will not support
it. This function applicable for higher configuration machine tools.

Note the rigid tapping cycle, the retreat speed and the speed cutting the last machining
plane are determined the feed speed (for the tapping axis, the feed speed the specified
the code. G98 and G99; for the spindle, the feed rate determined the specified spindle speed)
and the drawing override.

rigid tapping) set the drawing override fixed 100%.

following two situations:
(1) Parameter OV3 (system parameter NO.5201#4, specify whether the spindle speed valid when
retracting through the address determine the drawing override)

2.39.3. End face ordinary tapping cycle G84/Side face ordinary tapping cycle
G88
When G84/G88 the normal tapping mode, use auxiliary functions control the start
and stop the spindle: M03 (spindle forward rotation), M04 (spindle reverse rotation) and
M05 (spindle stop); CNC performs spindle rotation through the spindle encoder After detection,
the tapping axis follows the rotation the spindle. When the rigid tapping function cannot
used the machine tool, the ordinary tapping method provides more economical way
achieve tapping.
When using common methods for tapping, the spindle must use elastic chuck the
tool must use variable tap.

2.42.1 Variables
Variables can instruct address values the program. Variable values can assigned
program commands directly set keyboard. Multiple variables can used program,
and these variables are distinguished variable numbers.
Representation variables:
Use variable number indicate;
Format: (i=200, 202, 203....);
Example: #205, #209, #225.
Expressions can used specify variable numbers. this case, the expression
must enclosed parentheses.
Format: "#"+[expression];
Example: #[#20+#30/4] 号
Variable reference
Replace the value after the address with variable.
Format: <Address>+"# <Address>+"-# i", which means that the value
the variable the negative value the variable value taken the
address value.
Example:
F#203...When #203=15, has the same function F15 code;
Z-#210...When #210=250, has the same function Z-250 code;
G#230...When #230=3, has the same function code.
Replace the variable number with variable.
Format: "#"+[variable number];
Example: When replaced #30, written #[#30].
Empty variable
When the variable value not defined, such variable becomes empty variable.
Variable always empty variable, can only read, not written.
When referencing undefined variables (empty variables), the variables and address
words are ignored.
G00 X100 Z#2 equivalent GOO G00 X100 Z#2 equivalent GOO X100
X100

2.42.2 System variables
System variables are used read and write internal data. For example, tool offset
value and current position data, some system variables can only read. System variables are
the basis automatic control and general machining program development.
Interface signal
The interface signal the information exchanged between the programmable
machine tool controller and the user macro program, that is, interacts with the PLC
through the and signals, and the interface with the I/O defined the PLC.
The input signal can only read, and the output signal can read written.
System Variables Interface Signals
Macro
Variable Corresponding and Signals

according the value zero non-zero).

Tool offset
The tool compensation value can read and written using system variables. The
system variables the tool compensation storage area are 1501~2999. Among them,
the variable number this interval that can divisible 100 illegal variable
number. The specific range shown the table below.
Suppose the axis number (1~5), the compensation number (1~99), the offset
variable number the axis 1600+(n-1)*100+m, and the wear variable number
2300+(n-1) )*100+m. particular, except for the axis compensation number.

Macro program alarm
User-specified alarms and alarm information can occur the program. This variable 二
can only written but not read.
Macro
Variable
Number
When the assignment statement #3000=XXX executed, the system stops
running and alarms.
The alarm information can only display characters (13 Chinese characters),
exceeds, only the first characters will displayed.
The alarm number the value #3000 plus 3000, and the alarm range from 3000
3200. the value #3000 less than the alarm number 3000; the value
#3000 greater than 200, the alarm number 3200.
Example:
#3000=6; The tool not found
When the system executes this segment, the system stops and alarms, the alarm
number 3006. The alarm message "The tool not found". Due buffering
reasons, the system may give alarm advance.
The alarm information can use parentheses. For example, #3000=6 (the tool not
found). When both parentheses and semicolons appear this section, the
information specified later valid, for example, #3000=6 (the tool not found);
TOOL NOT FOUND, the system display information “TOOL NOT FOUND".
Stop message
251

--- Page 274 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
The execution the program can aborted, and then message displayed. That

Precautions
The system variable the state value the system, and needs buffered
advance when the multiple cycle executed. Therefore, avoid using the system
variable the cycle body the multiple cycle. this time, the obtained system
variable the value before the multiple cycle code, instead executing this point.
The value time. Therefore, necessary avoid using system variables the
loop body multiple loops. this time, the system variables obtained are the
values before the multiple loop code, rather than the values when executed this
time.

Transfer and cycle code
Use transfer and cycle codes the program change the flow control. There are
three transfer and cycle operations available: unconditional transfer GOTO,
conditional transfer IF...GOTO, IF...THEN and WHILE cycles.
Code format: GOTO
Code function: Unconditionally jump line number
Code format: <logical expression> THEN <expression>;
Code function: the logical expression true, execute the expression after THEN,
otherwise directly execute the next block;
Code format: <logical expression> GOTOn;
Code function: the logic expression true, jump the block marked with line
number execute, otherwise, execute the next block;
Code format: WHILE <logical expression> DOn;

2.42.4 Macro program statement and statement
The following block macro program statement:
block containing arithmetic logical operations
blocks containing control statements (such GOTO, DO, END);
block containing macro program call commands (G65, G66, G67).
Any block except the macro program statement statement.
the single block running mode, when the fifth bit (SBM) parameter No. 6000 set
the system directly skips the macro program statement and the machine tool does not stop.
When the fifth bit (SBM) parameter No. 6000 When set the system stops running
and enters stop state.
Macro program statements and statements are not allowed exist the same time
block.
261

--- Page 284 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual

2.43 Inclined axis control
The inclined axis control function means that when the inclined axis installed
angle other than 90° relative the orthogonal axis, the movement each axis controlled
the same way when the inclined axis 90° relative the orthogonal axis according the
inclined angle.
Arbitrary axes can assigned one group inclined axis and orthogonal axis 一
parameters.
The actual movement controlled according the inclined angle, but the program
programmed considering the perpendicular intersection the inclined axis and the orthogonal
axis. The coordinate system used this time called the program coordinate system (the
following content sometimes refers the program coordinate system the Cartesian
coordinate system, and the actual moving coordinate system called the inclined coordinate
system, the machine coordinate system).
Program coordinate system
(Cartesian coordinate system)
+Y' (imaginary-axis)
(inclined
axis) 一
(orthogonal axis)

(inclined coordinate)

(NO.8210).
When the manual reference point return operation performed along the inclined
axis, the parameter AZR (No.8200#2) can used select whether move the
orthogonal axis through the inclined axis.
setting the invalid control signal NOZAGC (G63.5) the orthogonal axis
inclined axis "1", the inclined axis control function can only valid for the
inclined axis. this time, the movement command the inclined axis can
converted into the inclined coordinate, but the orthogonal axis not affected
the movement command the inclined axis. This signal used when each axis
expected act independently.

2.44 Synchronous control feed axis
Synchronous control feed axis function means that when two servo motors are used
drive one axis, the two motors can synchronously controlled commanding one axis. The
axis that becomes the standard for synchronous control the feed axis the master axis
axis), and the axis that moves synchronously with the master axis called the slave axis
axis).
shown the figure below, the X-axis the master axis, and the axis the slave
axis.
Lat
ges
3.3
三
bee?
aQyie
Slave axis
一
Master axis
Fig. 2-131
Axis configuration for synchronous control feed axis
The axis that becomes the standard for synchronous control the feed axis called
the master axis axis), and the axis that moves synchronously with the master axis
called the slave axis axis). setting the axis number the master axis the
parameter (8311) the slave axis, determine the axis composition the feed axis
synchronization control.
There are two operation modes the synchronous control the feed axis, namely
synchronous operation and normal operation. Start the feed axis synchronization
control (valid), keep synchronization with the main control axis and make the
operation the slave control axis move into synchronous operation. addition, turn
off the feed axis synchronization control (invalid), and make the operation
independent movement the master axis and the slave axis become the normal
operation.
There are two operation methods: the method switching between synchronous
operation and normal operation input signal and the method always using
272

--- Page 295 ---
Chapter Code
synchronous operation. You can choose which method use setting the
parameter SCA (8304#5).
(1) For the slave control axis, when the parameter set SCA (8304#5) "0", the
synchronous operation and normal operation can switched through the signal
SYNCx/SYNCJx the axis number the slave control axis). When
SYNCx/SYNCJx "I", synchronous operation performed, and when
SYNCx/SYNCJx "0", becomes normal operation.
(2) For the slave control axis, when the parameter set SCA (8304#5) "I", has
nothing with the signal SYNCx/SYNCJx and always performs
synchronous operation.
the case the feed axis synchronization control, the output signal SYNOx
becomes "1".
For the slave control axis, you can set the parameter NDP (3115#0) "I", that the
slave control axis not displayed the screen the current position.
For the slave control axis, setting the parameter SAF (8303#2) "1", the slave
control axis can added the calculation the actual speed display the
synchronous operation.
Note: During synchronous control operation, perform position detection based the mechanical
coordinates the two axes. Please ensure that the parameters that can affect the mechanical
coordinates, acceleration and deceleration time constants, and servo drive parameters are consistent.
Synchronous adjustment
situations such when the power turned and after the servo alarms, the
main control axis and the slave control axis the feed axis synchronization control
may not the same position. this time, the function matching the positions
the master axis and the slave axis synchronous adjustment.
Synchronous adjustment can performed manual reference point return
operation. the synchronous operation mode, through the manual reference point
return operation the main control axis, the slave control axis follows the reference
point return. the normal operation mode, perform manual reference point return
operations the main control axis and the slave control axis respectively.
Synchronization error detection
Always detect the amount synchronization error. When the error exceeds the limit
value, alarm occurs stop the axis. this time, the synchronization error
detection based the machine coordinate value performed.
Compare the mechanical coordinate values the master axis and the slave axis.
When the error between the master axis and the slave axis greater than the value
273

--- Page 296 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
the parameter (8314), the motor will stop immediately when alarm occurs.
When the input signal switched and synchronous operation and normal operation
are used, error detection performed only during synchronous operation. Therefore,
the feed axis synchronization control selection signal SYNCx the feed axis
synchronization control manual feed selection signal SYNCJx set "0"
mistake during synchronous operation, the synchronization error amount will not
detected.
addition, you can use the machine coordinate coincidence state output signal
SYNMT confirm the state the machine coordinate values the master axis and
the slave axis.
When synchronization error detection alarm occurs, you can manually return the
reference point make the machine coordinate values consistent, and then reset and
clear the alarm.
Las}

3.1.3 Program stop M00
Code format: M00
Code function: When the M00 block executed, the system stops automatic operation.
the same the single block pause, all the modal information before
saved. That is, equivalent the program pause function. you
want continue executing the subsequent blocks, you must press the
cycle start button the operation panel again, and the CNC will 一
continue run automatically. 号
When M00 and other function codes are the same block, the code the block
executed first, and then M00 executed, and the system stops.
3.1.4 Choose stop M01
Code format: M01
Code function: After the block containing M01 executed, the operation stops
automatically, and the single-segment stop signal light on. the next
automatic start, turn off the single-stage stop signal light. The M01
code valid only when the selector stop switch the machine
operation panel pressed.

3.1.9 Precautions for using code
M00, MOI, M02, M30, M98, and M99 are generally specified separately block.
When commanded together with other codes, the system ignores other codes
and only executes the above codes; when the above codes are When
commanded the same block, the first commanded code valid.
When MOS, MII, M13, M33, auxiliary commands and commands are the
same segment, there are two execution modes:
一 The motion code and auxiliary function code are executed the same time.
mes
三 The auxiliary function code executed after the execution the motion code
completed.
Please refer the machine tool manufacturer's manual for the specific execution
method. the GSK's standard ladder diagram, only the second way executed
CNC allows codes specified block (when the seventh bit M3B
parameter 3404 set but due mechanical action restrictions, some codes
cannot specified the same time. For example, spindle automatic gear shift code
M41, M42, M43, M44.
The parameter 3010 sets the delay time the strobe signal MF, SF, signal.
Parameter 3011 sets the width the function end signal (FIN).

3.2.3. Multi-spindle control
GSK988TA has multi-spindle control function (controlling spindles). addition
the control the first spindle, the second and third spindles can controlled the
commands issued the CNC. The spindle command the same before. One command
used, and which spindle selected depends the signal sent the PLC the address
号 command.
The second and third spindles are also capable two-stage gear switching like the first
spindle.
addition, setting the maximum speed for each spindle, can clamped its own
speed. (It depends the setting parameter (No.3772).)
You can choose the position encoder interface the second and third spindles; the
selection the first third position encoders depends the signal sent the PLC.
Note: For multi-spindle control, parameter No. 3710 CNC controlled spindles valid when the number
spindles greater than
Control Mode
There are ways specify the speed multiple spindles: command
executed together with the spindle rotation code (support PLC required), the
spindle speed specified command.
command and spindle rotation code execute related parameters together
(based the system default standard ladder diagram)

3.3.1 Tool offset
The tool function code) GSK988TA has two functions: automatic tool change and 号
tool offset execution. The control logic automatic tool change handled PLC ladder
diagram, and the tool offset handled NC.
Code DOU
人 Tool offset number (leading cannot omitted)
Targettoolnumber(leading0canbeomitted)
Code function: The automatic tool post changes the target tool number position, and
executes the tool offset according the commanded tool offset number.
The tool offset number can the same different from the tool
number, that is, one tool can correspond multiple offset numbers. After
executing the tool offset, execute Too00, the CNC will reverse the offset
according the current tool offset, and the CNC will change from the
executed tool offset state the uncompensated state. This process
called canceling the tool offset. power-on, the tool number displayed
the code the state before power-off, and the tool offset number
the canceled state (that is, state). The number bits code can
set parameter No.3032, and the number bits tool offset
number can set parameter No.5002, the zero position (LD1).
Before machining, the position offset data (called tool offset tool offset) each tool
obtained through the tool setting operation. After the code executed during the program
291

--- Page 314 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
operation, the tool offset automatically executed. this way, when editing the program,
each tool written according the size the part drawing, without considering the positional
relationship between each tool the machine coordinate system. there deviation the
machining size due tool wear, the tool wear value can modified according the size
deviation. The sum the modified wear value and the offset value constitutes new tool
offset.

compensation value changes, the workpiece outer diameter changes with the diameter
value/radius value.

3.3.2 Tool life management
When using tool life management, please set the parameter TLF (No.8132#0) "1".
The tools are divided into several groups, and each group specifies the corresponding tool
life (use time number times). Each time the tool used, the used time number times
accumulated. When the current tool life reached, select the same group predetermined
order The next knife. When all the knives the group are exhausted, alarm generated.
3.3.2.1 Tool life management data
Set the maximum number groups used parameter No. 6813. Set the actual
number groups and the maximum number tools available each group the and
bits (GSI and GS2) the 6800 parameter.
1~1/8 the maximum number groups
(NO.6813)
1~1/4 the maximum number groups
(NO.6813)
1~1/2 the maximum number groups
(NO.6813)
Note After changing the and (GSI and GS2) the above parameter No. 6813 No. 6800, the
tool life data needs reset executing the tool life data input program.
Note the program tool life data, the same tool number can appear anywhere any time.
Note The code for tool registration consists tool selection number and tool offset number;
Note When using the tool life management function, the bit parameter No.5002 must zero.
295

--- Page 318 ---
GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
3.3.2.2 Tool life time counting
When the tool life counting mode not specified the tool life data input program, the
value the parameter LTM (No.6800#2) needs set determine whether the tool life
specified time number times.
Specify the tool life according the time use
According the parameter FGL (#6805.1) specify the unit tool life (0: minute
the unit; 0.1 second the unit).
When the tool group command (Too99 code) specified, the tool whose life the
tool group has not reached the end selected, and the tool life management started
for the selected tool. The time required for single block stop, feed hold, rapid traverse,
pause, mechanical lock and interlock, etc. are not included the life the currently
used tool.
The life the tool can specified 4300 minutes. According the setting
#6805.1 programming, the maximum life 4300 (minutes) 2580000 (0.1
一 seconds).
Specify the tool life according the number uses
When the tool group command (Too99 code) specified, the tool whose life the
tool group has not reached the end selected, and the life counter the selected tool
only incremented However, long there command for tool life
counting and restarting the code, the selection and counting new tools are
performed only when the reset state enters the initial tool group number command and
the tool change command after the automatic operation start state.
The tool life can set 65,535 times.
Note: Even the same tool group number commanded multiple times program, the number uses
will not accumulated, and new tool will selected.
3.3.2.3 Tool life count and then open code
When the life count specified the number times, the tool change signal will
output even there only one tool group whose life has reached the end when the tool life
count commanded and the code turned on. the tool group command code) after
the tool life count commanded and the code turned on, the tool whose life has not
reached the end selected the specified group, and the tool life counter only accumulates
result, the tool life can counted even cases other than the first tool group
command code) after the CNC enters the automatic operation start state from the reset state.
The tool life count tumed and the code turned on, and specified the
parameter (No. 6811).

When the tool life counted and the life the last tool the group has reached the end,
the tool change signal output. When the life count Type specified time, the tool change
signal will output soon the life the last tool the group reaches the end. the case
the specified number times, after the last tool the group has reached the end its life,
when the CNC reset command such M02 M30, when the tool life count
instructed and the code restarted, the tool change signal output.

LFCIV can used switch between valid and invalid life counting.
When the tool life counting invalid signal LFCIV set the tool life counting invalid
signal LFCIF becomes and the life counting invalid.
When the tool life counting invalid signal LFCIV set the tool life counting invalid
signal LFCIF becomes and the life counting valid.

Chapter IV. Tool Nose Radius Compensation
4.1 Application tool nose radius compensation
4.1.1 Overview
The part machining program generally compiled according the part drawing
certain point the tool (usually with the ideal tool nose, shown point Fig. 4-1).
However, actual machining turning tools, due process other requirements, the tool
nose often not ideal point, but circular arc. During cutting, there deviation between
the actual cutting point and the ideal cutting point, which will cause overcut undercut, and
affect the accuracy the part. Therefore, the tool nose radius compensation performed
improve the accuracy the parts while machining.
三
Fig. 4-1 Tool
The method offsetting the path the part contour tool nose radius the B-type
tool compensation method. This method simple, but the motion path the next block
processed after the execution block completed, the intersection the two
programs will phenomena such over-cutting.
order solve the above problems and eliminate errors, necessary establish
C-type tool compensation method. C-type tool compensation mode, when block read,
not executed immediately, but the next block read, and the corresponding motion path
(transfer vector) calculated according the connection the intersection the two blocks.
Since two blocks are read for premachining, the C-type tool compensation method can perform
more accurate compensation the contour. shown Fig. 4-2.
304

--- Page 327 ---
Chapter Tool Nose Radius Compensation
wy, tool nose center tool without tool offset
tool nose center tool with tool offset

nose and too! compensation

FTV MWAH tool nose center tool without tool offset

有 假想 尖 刀 补 的 路 Tool path with imaginary tool nose and tool

center the tool nose the starting position, shown Fig. 4-3; While easier set the
imaginary tool nose the starting position, shown Fig. 4-4; The tool nose radius can
ignored when programming. Figures 4-5 and 4-6 show the comparison tool path diagrams
when using tool nose radius compensation and not using tool nose radius compensation when
programming with tool nose center and imaginary tool nose respectively.

Note: Generally, the imaginary tool nose direction 1-8 used the G18 (Z-X) plane, and the imaginary

planes G17 and G19, use No. instead for compensation.
4.1.3 Compensation value setting
The imaginary tool nose number and tool nose radius value each tool must preset
before applying tool compensation. The tool nose radius compensation value set the
offset page (see Table 4-1), the tool nose radius compensation value, and the
imaginary tool nose number. The radius compensation value the sum the offset radius and
the wear radius.

一 Pay special attention the tool setting operation. When the imaginary tool nose
(n=0~9) selected, the tool setting point must also the imaginary tool nose point
(n=0~9). Fig. 4-10 shows the different tool setting methods when and tool nose points
are selected the rear tool post coordinate system. The tool holder center the standard point,
and the same tool, from the standard point the tool nose radius center (imaginary When the
tool nose TQ), the offset value different from the offset value from the standard point the
assumed tool nose (when the assumed tool nose T3). Take the center the tool post the
standard point, the same tool, the offset value from the standard point the tool nose radius
center (when the imaginary tool nose TQ) and the offset value from the standard point the
imaginary tool nose (when the imaginary tool nose T3) are not the same. Measuring the
distance from the standard point the imaginary tool nose much easier than measuring the
distance from the standard point the tool nose radius center. Therefore, the tool offset value
usually set based the distance from the standard point the imaginary tool nose (that is,
tool nose usually selected) direction).
