4.1.6 Precautions
the initial state, the system the tool nose radius compensation cancellation mode.
When G41 G42 executed, the offset compensation number not the CNC
starts establish the tool nose radius compensation offset mode. the offset
compensation number then The code modal remains the G40 state.
the process creating canceling tool compensation, not process the workpiece.
cutting code, overcut undercut will occur. The system treats the first
moving section code after creation and the last moving section code before
cancellation the cutting code the normal machining workpiece.
314

--- Page 337 ---
Chapter Tool Nose Radius Compensation
there movement code the place where the tool compensation established,
the tool will not produce offset, and the compensation will established the next
movement code. the same way, there movement code the place where the
tool compensation canceled, the tool will not produce offset, and the compensation
vector will canceled the next movement code.
When the tool compensation cancel modal code included the next moving block
the tool compensation section, the system will not execute the tool compensation
creation process, but the modal code will still change normally this time.
Only GOO GOI codes can used establish and cancel tool nose radius
compensation. arc code (G02 G03), I/J/K/R not specified, only-axis
displacement and parameter #3403.5=0 circular interpolation, I/J/K/R not
commanded, move the end point straight line). can also created and
canceled, otherwise the No. 252 alarm will generated.
tool nose radius compensation, when machining more blocks without moving
codes (such auxiliary functions, etc.), the tool nose center will move the end 号
the previous block and perpendicular the previous block program The location
the path. this time, over-cutting under-cutting may caused. During
programming, not process the workpiece the next moving segment. the
movement code for tool nose radius compensation established followed
more blocks without movement codes, the system will not establish tool nose radius
compensation immediately, but the first movement code that appears after the
non-movement code. Established in.
G50, G52, G32, G34, G92, G71, G72, G73, G74, G75, G76, G83-G85, G87-G89 codes
not execute tool nose radius compensation, and temporarily cancel the
compensation mode. the system mode G02 G03 before temporarily canceling
the compensation execution, the system will generate alarm No. 262.
Regardless the inner machining outer machining specified the G40 code, the
system will move the intersection the two trajectories, and then execute radius
compensation cancellation from this point, and move the canceled target point.
When there intersection, after the tool reaches the normal position the end
point the previous block, the tool radius compensation canceled and moved the
canceled target point. Overcut may occur this time, please not process the
workpiece.
the tool nose radius compensation mode, not allowed switch other planes,
otherwise the system will generate No.253 alarm.

10. the tool nose radius compensation mode, when you press the RESET key
execute M30 M02, the CNC will cancel the tool compensation mode. there
command G40 cancel the radius compensation and execute M30 M02 end the
program, the tool nose center will move the end the previous movement segment
and perpendicular the position the program path the block. there
movement command the M30 M02 segment, will canceled normally radius
compensation.
11. the input mode (MDI), the establishment tool nose radius compensation cannot
executed, and the cancellation tool nose radius compensation cannot executed.

4.2.1 Inside and outside concept
the following description, two terms "inside" and "outside" will used. When the
angle between the intersection two moving blocks greater than equal 180°,
called "inside"; when the angle between two moving blocks between and 180°, called
"outside". shown Fig. 4-15.

4.2.5 Tool interference check
Tool over-cutting called "interference" which can check the tool for over-cutting
advance, even the over-cutting does not occur, interference check will performed. But not
all tool interference can detected.
(1) Basic interference conditions
the direction between Tool trajectory program path different, the system
will generate alarm No. 257. (The angle between the paths from 90°
270°). Set the first bit parameter No. 5008 (CNC) not alarm.
During arc machining, the angle between the start and end points the tool
center path and the angle between the start and end points the program path
are very different (above 180°), the inside arc larger than 180° cut,
when the entrance cannot pass the tool, the system generates alarm No. 256.
Tool nose center path
are
人、、
Program
The directions the two
paths are

Fig. 4-71 Several Special Cases for Interference Machining (2)

(3) Automatic interference vector elimination
The system has the function automatic interference vector elimination. For
example, when the tool radius compensation performed the three adjacent
blocks N10, N20, N30, the vectors VI, V2, V3, are generated between the
blocks N10 and N20 while vectors V5, V6, V7, are generated between blocks
N20 and N30. The system first performs interference check the closest vectors
the two vector groups, that is, performs interference check and V5.
interference occurs, and are ignored; continue check and V6;
interference occurs, and are ignored; continue check and V7.
interference occurs, and will ignored. During the interference check
the last pair vectors and V8, interference occurs and cannot ignored,
the tool stops moving and generates alarm. When the system performs
interference check according the above process, vector that does not
interfere detected, the following vectors are longer checked, and the tool runs
according the first pair vector trajectories that not cause interference.
the last pair vectors also interfere, cannot ignored, the tool stops moving
and alarm No. 257 generated.
333

--- Page 356 ---

Fig. 4-77 G32 and G34 Temporarily Cancel the Compensation Vector the starting point and the cutting end point. During the cycle, the tool compensation
G90 and G94 code calculated according this direction.
Compensation method for tool nose radius compensation executed G90 G94 Execute G90 and G94 the state that the tool compensation has been established,
first cancel the tool compensation the positioning point, then the tool nose center
point parallels the programmed path and feeds the intersection the tool nose
center, and finally cyclically runs the positioning point. Tool compensation will
re-established the next GOO and G01 code.
After canceling the tool radius compensation, the imaginary tool nose point will move
the positioning point. When the tool inside the cycle, the tool diameter exceeds
the length the first rapid traverse section, will cause over-cutting and the system
will generate No. 255 alarm.

Fig. 4-80 G90 and G94 Radius Compensation Mode
G70 code
When the G71~G73 multiple cycle code executed, the system will temporarily
cancel the tool compensation and when the G70 cycle body executed again, the
CNC will automatically restore the compensation mode. Because the system does not
perform radius compensation when executing G71~G73, necessary reserve
fine cutting allowance during programming avoid over-cutting during rough
machining.
When G70 executed, the radius compensation first canceled the positioning
point, the radius compensation established the first section the cycle body, the
middle section compensated normally, and the radius compensation canceled
during the process returning the positioning point. the G70 cycle, the
compensation mode not canceled the end the cycle, the system will continue
compensate when reaches the positioning point, which will cause the last segment
338

the cycle necessary exceed the workpiece radius one tool radius.

Corner movement
When two more movement vectors are generated the end block, the tool
moves linearly from one vector another. This movement called corner movement.
the single block valid, the tool stays the last vector.
the two vectors coincide, the corner motion not completed and the second vector
will ignored. the increment the two axes the compensation plane less than
equal the setting value parameter NO.5010 (CLV), the second vector will also
ignored, but the next interpolation segment arc, will not ignored.

--- Page 372 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
Chapter Programming Fundamental
1.1 Product introduction
GSK988TA has editing, automatic, input, reference point return, MPG/single step,
manual, DNC operation and other operation modes.
Edit Program
The program can edited this mode, and the edited program saved the CNC
memory (see Chapter for details).
Automatic Operation
Automatic Operation move the machine tool according the edited program.
Once the program compiled the CNC memory, the system can run according
the program commands. This operation called automatic operation.
Tool
Workpiece
Fig. 1-1 Automatic Operation
Manual Data Input (MDI)
After inputting the program the MDI page, the machine tool can run according
the program commands. This operation called the Manual Data Input (MDI)
operation.
Reference Point Return
CNC machine tools have specific point, which used determine the position
the machine table. This specific point called the reference point, and the tool change
coordinate system setting performed this position. Usually after the power
turned on, the tool moves the reference point. Manual reference point return
use the switches and buttons the operation panel move the tool the reference
point.
350

--- Page 373 ---
Chapter Operation Overview
Reference
Tool
Machine operation panel
O00
ool
Fig. 1-2 Manual Reference Point Return
addition, the program command can also used move the tool the reference
point. This method called automatic reference point return.
MPG Feed
turning the MPG, the tool moves distance corresponding the angle rotation (see
5.4 Chapter for details).
Manual Operation
Using the switch, button MPG the machine operation panel, the tool can moved
along each axis.
三
加
Too
Machine operation panel
000 三
cco 全
Workpiece
Fig. 1-3
(1) Manual (continuously manual) feed (see 5.2 Chapter for details)
When the button pressed, the tool moves continuously while the button held
down.
(2) Incremental feed (see 5.3 Chapter for details)
When the key pressed, the tool only moves certain distance each time the key
pressed.
DNC Operation
Read the program directly from the external input/output device run the machine tool
without saving the program the CNC memory. This operation called DNC operation
(see 6.3 Chapter for details).
351

--- Page 374 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual The operator can make series settings the CNC through the CNC host keys. Common settings include: tool offset setting, CNC setting, and macro variable setting. Tool offset setting: The tool has its own dimensions (length, diameter). When machining call data about the tool dimension the offset. (See Chapter for CNC settings: CNC settings include: system settings, coordinate settings, system time settings and system settings.
workpiece with certain shape, the size the tool will vary details) Macro variable setting: CNC system can support various macro program editing, and the

2.2 Power-off
Before GSK988TA powered off, you should confirm:
一 All movable parts the machine tool have stopped running;
Auxiliary functions (such spindle, water pump, etc.) are closed;
Cut off the CNC power supply first, then cut off the machine tool power supply.
Note: you want restart after shutting down, you must shut down and hold for more than 20s before
加
starting operation.
For the operation cutting off the power the machine tool, please refer the manual
provided the machine tool manufacturer.
2.3. Over-travel protection

the travel switch. Reset clear the alarm.
Note: The over travel release method the machine tool may different from that described the
book. For specific operations, please refer the manual provided the machine tool manufacturer.
2.4 Storage stroke limit over travel protection
The GSK988TA system provides three storage stroke inspection areas: storage type stroke
limit check storage type stroke limit check and storage type stroke limit check These
three specified areas cannot accessed tools, shown Fig. 2-3 shown.
inside) Stroke
Li;
Memory Stroke Limit
Tool Forbidden Zone
Fig.2-3
When the tool exceeds the stored stroke limit，an alarm displayed and the tool
decelerates and stops. When the tool enters the forbidden area and generates alarm, the tool
can move the opposite direction when entered.
Storage type travel limit check The boundary set parameters (No. 1320, No.
1321 No. 1326, No. 1327), and the outside the setting range the forbidden zone. The
machine tool manufacturer usually sets this area the maximum stroke range.
Storage type stroke limit check (G22 G23): Set with parameters (No. 1322, No. 1323)
commands. When programming, use G22 command prohibit the tool from entering the
forbidden area, and G23 command allow the tool enter the forbidden area. G22 and G23
should designated separately the program and are independent blocks. Refer the
command section for details.
Storage type travel limit check Use parameters 1324 and 1325 set the boundary
this area the forbidden area.
Overlapping restricted areas: each restricted area can overlapped (as shown Fig.
367

--- Page 390 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual Valid time the restricted zone: After the power turned and the reference point Display the alarm time: Parameter BFA (No. 1300, digit) selects whether display invalid. Releasing the over travel alarm: When the tool cannot move the restricted area, Note: When setting the restricted area, the two points are set the same, the area follows: When the restricted area the storage type stroke check all areas are restricted areas. When the restricted area the storage type itinerary inspection the storage type itinerary inspection all areas are movable areas. When 1300.7=1, the machine coordinate outside the forbidden area the time the alarm. this time, press the reset key cancel the alarm directly. When 1300.7=0, the machine coordinate the prohibited area the time When setting the storage type stroke limit check, when the coordinate setting value the positive direction boundary less than the coordinate setting value the negative direction boundary, the soft limit function invalid.
returned manually automatically returned the reference point completed with G28, each the alarm immediately before the tool enters the forbidden area immediately after the tool switch manual mode reverse the tool (such positive over travel, move out negative alarm, this time, first manually move out the alarm area, and then press the 368

--- Page 391 ---
Chapter Power On/Off Safety Protection
2.5 Emergency operation
the process processing, due user programming, operation and product failure,
some unexpected results may occur. this time, the machine tool must stopped
immediately. This section describes the processing that the GSK988TA system can perform
emergency. For the processing CNC machine tools emergency, please refer the
relevant commands the machine tool manufacturer.
2.5.1 Reset
When the system outputs abnormally the coordinate axis moves abnormally, press
key make the system the reset state:
All axis movement decelerates stop;
function output invalid;
The automatic operation stops, and the modal function maintained.
Note: Whether the spindle forward/reverse, lubrication, cooling, etc. signals can automatically turned
off after the set parameters
a=]
2.5.2 Emergency stop
Press the emergency stop button (when the external emergency stop signal valid) during
the operation the machine tool, and the CNC will enter the emergency stop process. this
time, the machine tool movement will stop immediately and all outputs (such spindle
rotation, coolant, etc.) Close all. Release the emergency stop button release the emergency
stop alarm, and the CNC enters the reset state.
Note Confirm that the fault has been eliminated before releasing the emergency stop alarm;
Note Press the emergency stop button before powering and shutting down reduce the electrical
shock the equipment;
Note After the emergency stop alarm released, the reference point return operation should
executed again ensure the correctness the coordinate position.
2.5.3 Infeed hold
When the system running, you can press key pause the running. Special
attention should paid the fact that this function cannot stop the running action
immediately when thread cutting cycle command running.
369

--- Page 392 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual off immediately case danger emergency prevent accidents. However, must 三 Las} a=] la)
noted that the CNC displayed coordinates not match the actual position after the power 370
2.5.4 Cut off power supply turned off, and the reference point return operation must performed again.
During the operation the machine tool, the power supply the machine tool can cut

SERVO
Fig. 3-34
GSK988TA system servo adjustment module provides the following functions:
Real-time monitoring the system control axis through the data fed back the servo
communication, that the operator can understand the current working status the servo
drive unit, motor and other equipment, including:
408

--- Page 431 ---
Chapter Display Interface
(1) When the servo position control mode, displays the number command pulses
received the servo, the number feedback pulses the servo obtains from the motor
encoder, the actual speed the motor, the internal current the servo, and the
temperature detected the servo;
(2) When the servo speed control mode, the command speed received the servo,
the actual speed obtained the servo from the motor, the number command pulses
received the servo, the internal current the servo, and the temperature detected
the servo are displayed (the servo spindle increases the value the spindle encoder
Display).
Description each data display area the servo diagnosis interface
:The axis name the currently selected axis
STN. number corresponding the slave connected the axis
Run stat The current running status the servo
Run type. Corresponding servo control method
CHD POS Number position pulses received the servo from the system (displayed
position control mode)
CHD SPD. The command speed value received the servo from the system 号
(displayed the speed control mode)
ACTUAL POS :Number position pulses servo feedback
ENCDER VAL -Encoder value current motor position
POS ERROR Deviation value between command position and feedback position
ACTUAL SPO :The actual speed the motor
SER CURRNT Servo current working current value
SER TEMPIR :The temperature measurement value inside the servo
MOTOR TEMP. :The temperature the motor controlled the servo
GENERATRIX :The current bus voltage value the servo
The lower part Fig. 3-34 shows various gain adjustments for servo operation. The
corresponding adjustments can made this page when the system parameter switch
turned on. The adjustable options the servo gain are: position loop proportional gain,
position loop feed forward gain, position loop feedforward filter coefficient, speed loop
proportional gain, speed loop integral gain, speed feedback filter coefficient and analog
command filter coefficient. For the corresponding detailed adjustment commands, please refer
409

--- Page 432 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
the corresponding options the servo manual.
Axis switching: press ，to switch among X-axis,
Z-axis and axis display servo diagnosis and adjustment.

the user needs set and change the file the custom macro variable, press

MACRO jhe interface and the button enter the macro variable list page (as shown

variable the system. Can operate custom macro variables.
The operations custom macro variables this page include the following: execute,
a=]
stop custom macro variables, delete, save as, and import and export custom system macro
variable files.
Creation Custom Macro Variable File
The macro variable displayed this page that the user opens the editing format
EXT" file with text, writes and adds the macro variable according certain writing
format the file according the macro variable needed. Any macro with comment
defined the text will displayed independently the page custom macro
variables,
The writing format the comment file is: serial number comma macro variable
name "\t" comment content.
Example: local variable\local variable
Import Custom Macro Variables
Copy the edited custom macro variable file "*.EXT" the "MACROEXT" folder
IMPORT
the disk, insert the disk into the system, press —_the key copy all the custom
macro variable files the disk system.

connection sequence between the devices can arranged arbitrarily, and the control
not affected the arrangement. First, set the parameter No.9000.0 ‘I’ and turn
the GSK-Link bus communication switch.

3.7.1 Alarm information
ALARM
Under the information page set, press MESSAGE the soft key enter the alarm
information display page, which displays the detailed information CNC alarms and PLC
alarms. The page displayed shown Fig. 3-86.
ARM
全 [alm Wo. [content
三
三
加
加
15:05:35
Fig. 3-86
the alarm information display interface, the CNC and PLC alarm information and
prompts are listed the same window table, distinguished the alarm number. Press the
and down direction keys 从 scroll table row row, and the page key
the table page page.
458

--- Page 481 ---
Chapter Display Interface
When PLC alarms prompts, the address information displayed under the
information line; when CNC alarms prompts, the cause and solution description are
displayed under the information line.
Elimination alarm: Press key eliminate the alarm. For some alarms,
please refer the explanation the cause and solution.
Note When the PLC alarms prompts, the address information displayed black under the
information line;
Note When CNC alarms prompts, the cause and solution description will displayed black
under the information line.
Note 0-1000 alarms are CNC alarms, 1000-2000 alarms are PLC alarms, and after 2000 are prompt
messages.
Note When the parameters that are valid after power-on are modified, the alarm can eliminated only
after power-on again.
Note For detailed alarm messages and PLC alarms, please refer Appendix this manual.

including alarm date, alarm time, alarm number, and alarm content. The alarm log information
can viewed through the and eys. The displayed page

4.5 Block comment
When you need comment block, you can press the "EOB" key and add after the
block that needs commented. The content after the symbol the comment content.
addition, for the content contained the parentheses the program segment, the
system ignores the content, and the characters can obtained selecting the "Special
Characters” softkey the program editing page.
€.g.

M30;
the above program, comments are added the second and third blocks, the content
after the first semicolon that the comment, and the second semicolon the end the
block, which press key after writing block line break, automatically added
the system.
Note: Since this system does not support Chinese input, you want input Chinese comments, you must
edit the PC.

the program, the block number can programmed not, and the program executed
the order which the blocks are programmed (except when calling).

switch off, the CNC does not automatically generate the block number, but you can
manually program the block number during programming. 人

Chapter Manual Operation
Chapter Manual Operation
5.1 Manual reference point return
The CNC machine tool has specific point, which used determine the position the
machine tool table. This specific point called the reference point. Set tool change coordinate
system setting this position. Usually after the power turned on, the tool moves the
reference point. Manual reference point return use the switches and buttons the operation
panel move the tool the reference point.
GSK988TA reference point setting methods include three methods: zero return with block,
zero return without block, and zero return with absolute encoder.
Setting reference point with stop:
When the parameter DLZx (the first digit No. 1005) the reference point without
block setting invalid (that is, the reference point with block setting valid), and the
machine tool needs install deceleration switch return the reference point position.
The specific process: the tool moves the direction specified the parameter ZMI
(the No. 1006), the tool moves the deceleration point the rapid traverse speed, and
then moves the reference point the speed. The reference point return completion
三
indicator (LED) ¥~? 和- up, the reference point return ends, and the
coordinate system automatically set.
Note The rapid traverse speed, rapid traverse rate speed, and speed returning the reference
point each axis are respectively set parameters (No. 1420, No. 1421, No. 1425).
Setting reference point without stop:
When the parameter DLZx (the first digit No. 1005) the non-stop reference point
setting valid. Machine tool can return the reference point position without installing
deceleration switch
The specific process: each time the machine powered on, the tool moves the
reference point and the tool moves the direction specified the parameter ZMI (No.
No. 1006). When the system detects the first signal the motor, the reference point
return completion light (LED) ¢€C lights up, The reference point return
ends, and the coordinate system automatically set.
Note Since the establishment the non-stop reference point detect the first signal the current
position the reference point position, the reference point set each power-on may not the same,
use this method set After setting the reference point, the tool offset must reset.
Setting reference point absolute encoder
When the machine tool equipped with absolute position encoder and the absolute
position encoder reference point return function valid, the system has not established
reference point, necessary perform the absolute position encoder reference point return
495

--- Page 518 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual Note Manual reference point return can only return the position the first reference point, and the coordinate system automatically determined after the manual reference point return completed. Note Once the reference point return completed, the "reference point return complete” indicator will light up, and the machine will longer move until the reference point return switch turned off. Note When the operation "leaving reference point" "entering emergency stop” occurs, the return reference point completion indicator will out. Note The fifth digit parameter 1006 sets the direction each axis returning the reference point. Note The second digit setting parameter 1404; When the reference point established, and manually Note After the reference point the system with absolute encoder established, the system will 496
[IT returning the reference point, move the reference point rapid traverse speed manually rapid automatically establish the coordinate system after powering again, without the need return
operation. When the tool returns the reference point, the return reference point traverse speed.
completed, the LED lights up, and the coordinate system automatically set.
Steps reference point return
aad
(1) Turn the "Method Selection" knob the "Return Zero"
position;
(2) reduce the speed, turn the "fast override" knob low speed
gear,
(3) Press the corresponding feed axis direction selector switch
加
retum the reference point start the operation
号 returning the reference point. The tool moves the deceleration point rapid
traverse speed (absolute position encoder zero return does not have deceleration
point, but directly returns the reference point quickly), and then moves the
reference point the speed set the parameter. When the tool returns the
reference point, the return reference point completion light (LED)
一 一
4thO up;
(4) Perform the same operation other axes.

multiplying dial.

5.5 MPG retraction
The MPG retract function can use MPG (hand pulse generator) automatic operation
move the program forward backward. actually executing the mechanical action the same
time, you can easily check the program for errors.
Inspection Mode
this mode, the program executed the forward reverse direction check the
program. set the inspection mode, the CNC should placed the automatic operation
mode, and the inspection mode signal MMOD <G67.2> should set setting the
check mode, the data for the reverse movement created when the program moves forward.
addition, necessary synchronize the movement with the pulse the manual pulse
generator the inspection mode. addition the above settings, the manual MPG check
signal MCHK<G67.3> must set result, the program inspection using the manual
pulse generator can performed.
Forward Movement
The so-called "forward movement" means that the program executed the forward
direction rotating the manual pulse generator the forward direction (the MPG check
signal MCHK<G67.3> "I"). The execution speed the program proportional the
rotation speed the hand pulse generator. long the hand pulse generator moved
quickly the positive direction, the speed will increase. the hand pulse generator rotates
slowly the positive direction, the speed will slow down.
Reverse Movement
The so-called "reverse movement" make the manual pulse generator rotate the
reverse direction (counterclockwise rotation), that the block that once moved forward
executed reverse. The reverse movement the program can only performed the
block that has been moved forward. The program execution speed the opposite direction

--- Page 524 ---

5.5.3 Reverse movement rule each code
The modal information the code all stored when moving forward, and the data used
when moving backward.
Code
When the code that changes the modal information moved the reverse direction,
the modal information before the change executed.
5.5.4 Precautions
When the M30 block executed, the manual control MPG retreat ended.
Starting from the M30 block, cannot move the reverse direction. The 三
program ends and the check mode signal and manual MPG check signal are set
When the inspection mode, dry run cannot used, and the dry run signal must
set "0".
During the execution the program, the working mode cannot switched.
When M198 calls external subroutine, although forward movement can
performed, reverse movement prohibited.
the process executing the thread cutting block, the MPG pulse becomes invalid,
and always executed the speed 100%. And forbidden move the
opposite direction.
The multi-spindle function may operate incorrectly when the MPG moving
reverse.
The axis based PLC axis control cannot controlled this function.
When the macro program executed MPG retreat, may cause incorrect
movement.
This function not supported DNC mode.

5.6.3 MPG interruption cancellation
Returning the workpiece coordinate system offset from the machine coordinate system the
505

--- Page 528 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
workpiece coordinate system before the offset MPG interruption called cancellation the
interruption amount. When canceling the interruption amount, the workpiece coordinate system
only offset the MPG interruption amount.
The MPG interruption amount reflected the absolute coordinate value. The workpiece

5.6.6 Precautions for MPG interruption
(1) During manual feed (manual feed mode, MPG feed mode, etc.), MPG interruption
cannot performed.
(2) Mechanical lock valid. When the machine locked, the movement caused
interruption the MPG will not occur.
(3) The interlock valid. When interlocked, movement caused interruption the
MPG will occur.
(4) For the axes the following states, MPG interruption invalid.
507

--- Page 530 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
T_T
Location tracking.
PLC axis under control.
(5) For the axis commanded GOO mode, MPG interruption not possible.

6.1 Automatic operation
The program pre-stored the memory. When program selected and the cycle start
button the machine operation panel pressed, the program starts run automatically.
And the cycle starting light on. During the cycle start, when the feed hold the machine
operation panel the automatic operation temporarily stopped. When the cycle
start button pressed again, the automatic operation resumes. When key the MDI
panel pressed, the automatic operation ends and enters the reset state.
6.1.1. Running program choice
(1) Press function key enter the program page set.
(2) the program page set, press and eys move the cursor 二

sean
select the program name. press soft key find the name the program
run. The selected program line displayed with green background, shown
Fig. 6-1.

6.1.2 Program running
(1) Turn the "Mode Selection" knob the "Auto" position.
(2) Press key start the program, the program will automatically run and start,
and the cycle starting light will on. When the automatic operation ends, the cycle
starting light goes out. When M99 specified the last block, you can return the
beginning the program after the end the run, and run the program repeatedly
cycle.
(3) order stop cancel the memory operation halfway, there are the following methods:
Stop memory operation
Press the feed hold button the machine operation The feed hold
light and the cycle start light off. The machine responds follows:
When the machine tool moving, the feed operation decelerates and stops.
When the pause (stop tool) being executed, the operation will stop.
When the and functions are executed, the operation stops after the
and functions are completed.
Press the cycle start button the machine operation panel while the feed hold
510

--- Page 533 ---
Chapter Automatic Operation
light and the machine operation restarts.
Terminate memory operation
Press key the MDI panel, the automatic operation ends and enters the
reset state.
Note: The running the program starts from the line where the cursor located, you should check
whether the cursor the block that needs run before pressing key run.
6.1.3 Run from any block
ite
(1) Rotate the Bate "Select mode" knob the "Edit" position, enter the edit mode,
press soft key enter the program interface, press the

select the program content page; press move the cursor the block
ready start running Place; the program page concentrated, use the and eys
OPEN
select the program run, press —___the soft key enter the open program editing
interface, and then use the eys move the cursor the block run,
LOAD 个
and then press Ithe soft key return the position display page.
(2) the modal (G, command) the block where the current cursor located default
and inconsistent with the mode running the block, the corresponding modal function must
executed before the next step can continued.
(3) Rotate the "Method Selection" knob the "Auto" position, press key start the
program running, and the program will executed from the selected block.
6.1.4 Light-flooding
可
When the symbol added front the block, press the jswitch start the skip
mode, and the skip switch indicator will on. When program executed, the block
will skipped and not run. Such the fourth line the following program:
00001;
511

--- Page 534 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
G50 ZO; set the coordinate zero point;
G01 X100 Z100; quickly move X100, Z100 position;
/GO ZO;
M30;
fourth line will skipped when pressing Run Program.
6.1.5 G31 jump
When the G31 code edited before the block, the external jump signal (X0.4) input
during the execution the code, the execution the code will interrupted and the next block
will executed. This function can used for dynamic measurement workpiece size (such
grinder), tool setting measurement, etc. Such the second line the following program:
00002;
G31 Z200 F100; When the program executed, the external jump signal (X0.5) input, the
program will interrupted and the next program will executed.
G01 X100 Z300;
M30;
Note: For the detailed usage G31 jump code, please refer 2.21 Chapter Part One.
6.1.6 Automatic running stop
全 The memory operation can stopped the following methods: command stop press the
三
relevant key the machine operation panel stop.
Command Stop (M00, M01, M02, M30)
After the block containing M00 and MO! (the stop button selected the machine tool
panel valid) executed, the automatic operation stopped, and the modal functions
and states are all saved. After pressing key, the program continues execute.
When M02 M30 (commanded the end the main program) read in, the program
runs and enters the reset state.
Different machine tool manufacturers have different operations. Please refer the
machine tool manufacturer's manual for details.
Press Relevant Key Stop
After pressing key during automatic operation, the machine tool the
following state:
(1) Machine tool feed decelerates stop;
(2) The modal function and state are saved;
(3) After pressing key, the program continues execute.
Press the Reset oll
(1) All axis movement decelerates stop;
(2) function output invalid (whether the spindle
512

--- Page 535 ---
Chapter Automatic Operation
lubrication, cooling, etc. signals are automatically closed after the parameter
setting button);
(3) After the automatic operation ends, the modal function maintained.
Press Emergency Stop Bottom
Press the emergency stop button (when the external emergency stop signal valid)
during the operation the machine tool, and the CNC will enter the emergency stop
process. this time, the machine tool movement will stop immediately and all
outputs (such spindle rotation, coolant, etc.) Close all. Release the emergency stop
button release the emergency stop alarm, and the CNC enters the reset state.
Switch Operation Mode
When switching reference point return, MPG/single step, manual operation
during automatic operation, the current block will "paused" immediately; when
switching edit and input mode during automatic operation, the current block will
executed after the operation completed. After stopping.
Note Confirm that the fault has been eliminated before releasing the emergency stop alarm.
Note Press the emergency stop button before powering and shutting down reduce the electrical
shock the equipment.
Note After the emergency stop alarm released, the reference point return operation should executed
again ensure the correctness the coordinate position.

6.4 Automatic running status control
6.4.1. Machine lock and auxiliary lock
The machine lock function used during operation where the coordinate position changes
without moving the tool. After using this function, all axes are locked and the movement all
axes stopped. addition, there auxiliary function lock, which locks the and
commands. used check the program the same the machine lock.
6.4.1.1 Machining lock
The machining program executed, but the machine does not move, only the change the
tool position displayed, and the machine lock used check the program. Stop the movement
all axes when the machine locked.
Press the machine lock switch the operation panel. The machine tool does not

Fast moving speed,
Press the dry run switch the operation panel. and the machine tool moves the JVmax: the maximum feedrate override scale value
speed set the parameter regardless the feed speed specified the program. This function JV: Feedrate override scale value.

人 人 人
Note (When the parameter RDR (NO.1401#6) "1", the running speed dry running speed *JV; when
"0", the running speed fast moving speed.
Note The maximum cutting feed rate set parameter No. 1422;
Note The rapid traverse speed set parameter No. 1420;
Note The dry run speed set No. 1410 parameter.
Note automatic operation, dry min cannot switched, but can switched during pause.
Note the G83 and G85 drilling and boring process, the dry running mode can switched after single
block stop pause, but the actual cutting speed remains unchanged. This speed can only
switched after cutting completed. During the execution the program, the dry run function
cannot tumed off real time. The dry run function can only switched after single
block stop pause, and even the dry run mode switched during the drilling process, the speed
will still maintain the original feed rate (Dry running state before cutting based dry running
speed; otherwise, based command speed). This speed can switched only after cutting
completed.
6.4.3 Single-segment operation
When the program executed for the first time, prevent accidental programming errors,
single-segment operation can selected.
automatic operation mode, the method turning the single-segment program switch
follows:
Press the single-segment switch Lae the single-segment mode, and the
single-segment operation indicator light on. single block mode, when the cycle start button
pressed, block the program executed, and then the machine tool stops; when
continuing execute the next block, you need press key again, and repeat this
process until the program runs. the single block mode, use block block execution program
check the program.
Single-segment operation steps:
(1) Press the single block switch the machine operation panel, and press the cycle start
button xecute block the program. After the current block executed, the
machine tool stops;
(2) Press the cycle start button execute the next block and the machine will stop after the
block executed.
Note Reference point return and single-segment operation: G28 G30 commands are issued, the
single-segment function the intermediate point valid.
Note Sub-program segment and single-segment operation: single-segment stop the block with M98P_;
M99; G65.
Note For the execution canned cycle and multiple cycle single-segment mode, please refer the
relevant content the code manual.
6.4.4 Infeed speed override
The programmed infeed speed can reduced increased selecting the percentage value
(“%) the override dial. This feature used check the program. For example, when the infeed
519

--- Page 542 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
speed specified |00mm/min the program, and the override scale set 50%, the machine
tool will move speed 50mm/min.
Steps change the infeed override: before during automatic operation, set the feedrate
override dial the machine operation panel the desired percentage
tes
150
We:
Infeed override knob
Override can specified from 150%. For individual machine tool, the scope stated
the specifications the machine tool manufacturer.
Thread cutting override: During thread cutting, the override invalid and the infeed speed
specified the program maintained.
6.4.5 Fast moving override
There are four override rapid traverse rate (FO, 25%, 50% and 100%). The rapid traverse
speed each axis set parameter No. 1420, and set parameter No. 1421.
Steps change the rapid traverse override: During rapid traverse, use the rapid traverse
x1000
ie}
全
override knob select one four speeds.
The following types rapid traverse are all valid, and the rapid traverse override
applicable them:
(1) GOO Rapid movement
(2) Rapid movement during the canned cycle;
(3) Manual rapid movement;
(4) Rapid movement manual reference point return;
(5) Rapid movement G28 and G30.
6.5 Program restart
When the tool damaged during automatic operation, when you want restart the
processing that was interrupted before the break after few days rest, you can specify the
sequence number the block you want restart the number blocks (from the beginning
the program the one you want restart). The number blocks the block), the machining
can restarted from this block.
There are two types restart modes follows.
type: restart when the tool has been damaged.
520

--- Page 543 ---
Chapter Automatic Operation
type: restart after the power cut off for while (after few days rest) after the
emergency stop released.
The program can restarted from any position.
Used for restarting when the tool broken.

cleared the program restart command and the cycle start command the movement correct, and confirm whether the tool may touch the workpiece (No. 7310) one one the dry run speed the position where the machining executed two ways: Execute before moving the restart processing position; Execute When the parameter MOU (No.7300#7) and the parameter MOA (No.7300#6)

possibility, manually move the tool until does not touch. the location any the tool moves the restart processing position, Automatically output the last
object. code PLC.
When the single block stop state, after outputting the last code, you need
press the cycle start switch again move the tool the restarting position.

codes)/G92 set codes), will output the maximum spindle speed;
other codes, then output the command spindle speed. However, the display
the last code the program restart screen, matter whether the same
block G50 G92, only the last designated code displayed.
(2) also possible automatically output all the sampled codes and the last and
codes the PLC during the search for the block that you want restart.

after searching the block that you want restart, press the cycle start switch, and
before the tool moves the restarting position, Automatically output all codes and
the final and codes the PLC.
However, the maximum number codes that can sampled 35. When the
number codes sampled exceeds 35, the latest are output the PLC.

Chapter Automatic Operation
Whether execute (1) execute (2) switched the parameter MOA
(No.7300#6).
Execute before reaching the restart processing position
When the parameter MOU (No.7300#7) the corresponding codes can
specified the MDI mode during the period from the search the block that you want
restart before the restart processing position reached.
6.5.3 Functional limit
type restart
Under the following conditions, P-type restart cannot performed:
(1) When the automatic operation has not been executed after power-on;
(2) When the automatic operation has not been executed after the emergency stop reset;
(3) After the coordinate system changed the offset changed (the external
workpiece zero offset changed), the automatic operation has not been performed
yet.
Restart block
The restarted block does not have the interrupted block, can started from any
block. But P-type restart, must block the same coordinate system
when was interrupted.
Single Program Segment
When the single block when the tool moves the restart position, the single
block stops every time axis operated. However, MDI intervention cannot
performed this time.
Manual intervention
the middle moving the restart position, manual intervention can performed
the axis that has not yet performed the return operation. However, the axis that has
completed the return will not move due the return operation.
MDI
After the search completed, the MDI cannot used specify the movement
command before the axis movement executed.
Reset
not perform the reset operation during the process restarting processing after the
retrieval. Otherwise, the restart operation must performed again from the first step.
Feed hold
When the feed hold operation executed during the search, the restart operation must
executed again from the first step.
Manual absolute value switch
Regardless whether processing has started, please execute manual operation with the
manual absolute mode set ON.
Reference point return
there absolute position detector (absolute pulse encoder), the reference point
return operation must performed after the power turned and before the restart
operation performed.
10. Program restart switch
When the program restart switch turned on, will not start even the cycle start
switch pressed.
525

--- Page 548 ---

that searching for this block will generate alarm "cannot find the specified
sequence number block number". this case, please search only the block
immediately before.

7.3 Trial cutting tool settings (mechanical return zero)
With this tool setting method, there problem that the reference tool not the reference
535

--- Page 558 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
tool. When the tool worn any tool adjusted, only the tool needs re-calibrated. The
mechanical zero point returned once before the tool setting, and the machining can continued
after the mechanical zero point returned only once after the power turned off. The operation
simple and convenient.
Trial cutting tool setting use the measurement input mode set the tool offset value
when the coordinate system established.
The operation steps are follows (as shown Fig. 7-8, the workpiece coordinate system
established with the workpiece end face):
Fig. 7-8
(1) Ensure that each axis the machine tool has returned the mechanical zero point;
(2) Choose any tool and make the offset number the tool (such T0100, T0300);
(3) Make the tool cut along the surface;
(4) Withdraw the tool along the X-axis when the Z-axis not moving, and stop the spindle
rotation;
OFST
(5) Under the setting page set, press the soft key enter the tool offset
management page, and select the tool offset number pressing soft key, the

page page down keys select the page, and the and
down direction select the tool modified Partial wear data;

The measurement input method set the difference between the tool reference position
(such the tool tip position) and the tool tip position the tool actually used processing the
tool offset value. For example: when the coordinate value surface 50.0, the actually
measured a=49.0, the X-axis tool offset this tool offset 1.0.
Note: After returning the machine zero point for tool setting, the G50 command cannot used set the
workpiece coordinate system.
7.4 Location record
There position record button the machine operation panel. effective when the
parameter PRC (NO.5005#2) set
Position record tool setting operation mode:
Manually cut the outer circle end face the workpiece.
When the button the operation panel the machine side pressed. the
workpiece coordinate values the X-axis (X-axis the basic axes) and Z-axis (Z-axis
the basic axes) are recorded the CNC.
Then, retract the tool and stop the spindle. the outer circle direction, measure the
三 SURE
diameter. Press INPUTIthe soft key the tool offset number corresponding the tool
offset and enter the X+measurement value, then press OK. the end face, the
measurement will leave the datum. The length the surface, (assuming the reference
SURE
surface Z=0), press —INPUTIthe soft key the tool offset number corresponding the
tool offset, enter Z+measured value, and then press OK.
Note the button pressed multiple times. CNC only records the position
when the button last pressed.
Note Position recording can also used the fixed-point tool setting mode: After setting the reference
tool, press the button after the other tools reach the tool setting point the current
coordinate position, and follow the fixed-point tool setting method after the tool retracted. Just
enter the tool offset.

tool compensation. First issue command for measurement move the tool the measurement

9.1. Program transfer
First, create new folder the root directory the disk, rename GSK988TA (the
folder name the same the product type), and copy the program that needs transferred
the folder, shown Fig. 9-1.
Trees
上
Fig. 9-1
After completing the above operations, insert the USB flash drive into the USB interface the
system communication area. When the logo happears the lower right corner the system
screen, means that the USB flash drive connected. Press this time and press
soft key enter the USB flash drive file directory. shown Fig. 9-2, enter
the USB flash drive file directory. shown Fig. 9-2, use and cursor keys
INPUT
select the program copied, and press —CNC_Ithe soft key copy the selected program
the disk directory the local directory.

INPUT
cursor select the 00001 program the disk directory, and then press —G_to copy 00001
the local directory.

9.2 Data backup
GSK988TA system can back system files and parameters disk for later recovery.
三 9.2.1 System file backup
The disk can used back the parameters, tool offsets, pitch compensation, tool life,
macro variables and other data the system, and restore data when there data error caused
disoperation. The solutions are follows:
Insert the disk and confirm that the system has read the disk;
DEVICE
Press the Ifunction key enter the system page, press soft key
enter the file management display page, the page display shown Fig. 9-3;

restored due insufficient authority.

Appendix Parameter Description
Appendix Parameter Description
This chapter mainly explains the meaning GSK988TA parameters. Different functional
requirements can achieved through different parameter settings.
There are mainly the following six types parameter data.
(1) Bit type Egg
1086 DIAx ROSx ROTx
axis its
(2) Bit axis type 加 bits
(3) Bit spindle
type
(4) Font type
parameters have
Word axis 1820 CAN
Nowe [ent set value
type
ranges. For
tail
(6) Font spindle 3728 CNT oma see 三
type 1024 [Value Range
the parameter.
Each parameter should contain the following information:
Modification authority System (level 1), machine tool (level 2), equipment (level 3),
operation (level 4), restricted (level 5).
Parameter type] Bit type, bit axis type, bit spindle type, font type, word axis type, and
word spindle type.
Valid ModeZ Immediately, power on.
Value range Interval, enumeration, special determination.
Factory default 8-bit binary, 32-bit integer value.
Input and output] The parameter may related irrelevant the “input unit" and
“output unit".
Note The [value range bit type
Note the Valid mode not marked, the parameter effective immediately.

basic Y-axis and its parallel axis, basic Z-axis and its parallel axis, rotary axis. But
each axis the basic axis can only set one: parallel axis can set more
than (parallel the basic axis).

5002#4 (LGT) 0), the displayed position the programmed position that ignores the tool
compensation (set this parameter 1). However, the programmed position that does not
include the tool contour compensation amount cannot displayed.

compensation

(LGT) 0), displays the programmed position where the tool compensation
ignored (this parameter set 1), but cannot display the tool shape compensation
amount programming location.

Appendix Parameter Description
Parameter type」: Word axis type-real number type

Valid mode] Power

0~9999.9999
Machine
0~999,.99999
Machine
The pitch compensation points are distributed equal intervals, and the interval value
set separately for each axis. The minimum value the distance limited and determined
the following formula: minimum value maximum feedrate (rapid feedrate)/7500.
Unit: Minimum pitch screw compensation: mm, inch, deg.
Maximum feed rate: mm/min, inch/min, deg/min.
[Example] The minimum value the pitch error compensation interval when the 三
maximum feed speed 15000mm/min 2mm.
However, according the set magnification, when the absolute value the
compensation amount the compensation point exceeds 100, the magnification calculated
the following formula will enlarge the interval the compensation point.
Multiple maximum compensation amount (absolute value) 128 (numbers after the
decimal point are rounded)
The minimum pitch pitch compensation the value obtained from the
above-mentioned maximum feedrate multiple.
Note: The unit the pitch compensation value the same the detection unit. Detection unit
and parameter 1820 (command multiplication ratio CMR) and the most
The pitch error compensation value (PCD) the reference point when
moving from the direction opposite the return-to-origin direction the
reference point

Set the gain adjustment data the spindle speed analog output.
(1) Setting Method:
(1) Set the standard setting value 1000.
(2) The spindle speed when the analog output maximum
voltage command spindle speed 0V.
(3) Measure the output voltage.
(4) Set the value the following formula parameter No.
3730:
Set value (V) 1000 measured voltage (V)
(5) After setting the parameters, again command the spindle
speed analog output the spindle speed the maximum
voltage, and confirm that the output voltage should
Parameter type」: Font spindle type
Modification authority Machine tool
Parameter default]
Valid way Immediate
Value range] -1000~1000 三
This parameter sets the compensation value the spindle speed analog output bias
voltage.
Setting Method:
(1) Set the standard setting value
(2) Command make the analog output voltage theoretical spindle
speed.

signal
Parameter type] Font type
Modification authority Machine tool

Valid way Immediate
Value range] 0~1000
When the MPG feed instantaneously exceeds the rapid traverse speed, the pulse
703

--- Page 726 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
exceeding the rapid traverse not canceled but stored.
This parameter sets the allowable value the storage capacity.
Note: When larger magnification such <100 selected, the manual pulse generator
rotates quickly, and the MPG feed greater than the rapid traverse speed, the speed
limited the rapid traverse speed. Pulses exceeding the rapid movement speed are
ignored, the scale value the hand pulse generator does not match the actual
movement amount. this time, the allowable value set this parameter
advance, the pulse exceeding the rapid traverse speed will not canceled, but will
temporarily stored the CNC (however, the part greater than the allowable value
ignored). When the MPG rotation speed slows down the rotation stops, the stored
pulse becomes the movement command output. But the allowable value set too
large, even the MPG has stopped rotating, the CNC will have move the stored
pulse before stops. Please pay special attention this.

Appendix 2.2 Standard ladder diagram address definition
The I/O GSK988TA divided into high-speed I/O signal and general I/O signal. The
high-speed I/O signal the one the CN61 interface the back cover the CNC. The
general signal the one the expansion I/O unit. The functions CNC I/O signals
(except the signals marked with fixed addresses) are defined the built-in PLC program
(ladder diagram) the system. When the GSK988TA system assembled with the machine
tool, the I/O function determined the machine tool manufacturer's design. Please refer
the machine tool for details. Manufacturer’s commands.
this section, the general I/O signal (ie address) function described for the
742

GSK988TA standard PLC program, please pay attention!

Appendix 2.2.2 I/O interface general machine tool
The general-purpose input and output GSK988TA are distributed through GSKLink
communication connection I/O unit. maximum I/O units can connected through the
GSK-Link bus, each I/O unit has maximum input points and output points. The
address range X80~X127 and Y80~Y127, and the user needs customize according
their needs ConFig. the system address.
I/O unit with input points and output points conFig.d the standard
configuration GSK988TA. The configuration addresses the standard ladder diagram the
system are X100~X105 and Y100~Y 103, all which are introduced this manual I/O signal
addresses are all based this standard.
there are differences, please check the machine tool manual provided the machine
tool manufacturer.

Appendix Interface Description
Appendix Interface Description
Appendix 3.1 CNC host
The interface GSK988TA divided into interface the front panel CNC and
interfaces the rear panel.
Appendix 3.1.1 GSK-Link bus interface
The bus interfaces GSK988TA are CN5 and CN4 (GSK-LinkA and GSK-LinkB), which
are connected the feed servo drive unit, spindle drive unit and expansion I/O unit with
GSK-Link bus communication function.
The GSK-Link bus communication connection line shown Fig. 3-1.
Fig. 3-1 GSK-Link Communication Connection
Appendix 3.1.2 Spindle encoder interface
GSK988TA has two encoder input interfaces (CN21, CN22), and the interface pin diagram
shown Fig. 3-2. When the spindle encoder not used but the GSK-Link spindle used, use the
GSK-Link interface read the encoder speed.
ncoder ase pulse
nas
oO)
Fig. 3-2 CN21, CN22
encoder interface
(9-pin D-pin socket)
749

--- Page 772 ---
Or- 19k GSK988TA Lathe CNC System Programming Operation Manual
Signal Description
*PCS/PCS, *PBS/PBS, *PAS/PAS are the differential input signals the encoder's
C-phase, B-phase, and A-phase respectively; *PAS/PAS, *PBS/PBS are quadrature square
waves with phase difference 90°, The highest signal frequency less than 1.2MHz;
the line number the encoder used GSK988TA set the system parameter
NO.3720 (the line number the spindle encoder).
Spindle Encoder Interface Connection
The connection the GSK988TA spindle encoder shown Fig. 3-3, and the
twisted pair used for the connection (take Changchun Yiguang ZLF-12-102.4BM-C05D
encoder example).

Signal Description
HA+, HA- and HB+, HB- are the MPG A-phase and B-phase differential input
signals respectively.
The X37.0~X38.1 signals are the input addresses defined the PLC interface,
which are used for the axis selection and gear signal input the external handheld box.
X37.0~X38.1 signals are valid for high level input.

accessories
